r:
Once upon a time, a mage of light read the homestuck epilogues and felt that they could write a better one. 
This is the result. 

Suggestions are open! 

https://lavendersiren.itch.io/none-pizza-with-left-beef

Also available in game form, will use the game as a base but can potentially go beyond its scope to a degree. Boundary stretching may result in content being added to the game later.

Join our Discord server!
https://discord.gg/Ykh6hrf

[size=16][u]What is this??[/u][/size]
None Pizza with Left Beef is a homestuck epilogue largely written by lavenderSiren. This adventure is also open to suggestions, though they will be processed and filtered to a degree in order to work optimally.

[size=16][u]Wat. I don't get it.[/u][/size]
This adventure is best enjoyed with a decent amount of Homestuck knowledge and a mild dislike/sense of disappointment for the officially published epilogues, Meat and Candy.

Optional but not particularly expected is knowledge of SBARG, particularly from 1.5 Lost Pawns and 2.5 Dungeon Crashers. Be warned that the SBARG iceberg goes very deep.

If you wish to read more about Thoren, their previous adventures, and the sessions they've been apart of, here are some links: 
(Do note that there are some deadnames present! Viewer discretion advised! (Links with duct tape cannot be read or interacted with from within setting! [img=24x24]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/ducttape.png[/img]))

[img=24x24]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/ducttape.png[/img][alt=Side stories and potential cognitohazards, often both at the same time][url=https://mspfa.com/?s=45532&p=1]Duct Tape with Extra Toppings[/url][/alt][img=24x24]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/ducttape.png[/img]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-1.png[/img]
[font=Times New Roman]An adult stands-[/font]

[spoiler open="Open Authorlog" close="Hide Authorlog"][font=Times New Roman]...I can't write with this font.
I don't like times new roman.
Every single time I see times new roman, it reminds me of all those times I tried to install a webfont into a webpage. Half the time it just, never worked and gave me freaking times new roman instead. 
In protest, I'll be using Courier New, which should HOPEFULLY be on your machine.[/font][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-2.png[/img]
There we go, that should do it.
Now where was I?

An adult stands in their bedroom. It seems they have temporarily forgotten their name. 
What is this individual's name? 
(7 characters max on first name)

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-3.png[/img]
Neroht? 
Well, this person has committed arson before... (as well as various other crimes)
...but sadly, that is not their name.

Try again?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-4.png[/img]
You wish. 
The closest they'll ever get is as a mii fighter.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-5.png[/img]
...No.
You've had enough troubled nights trying to convince yourself that you are not your evil mentor as it is.

...Wait, you're getting something.
You remember your name now!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-1.png[/img]

Your name is Thoren Emit. You are an Heir of Time.

Long ago you had played a game with countless others, killed many, died many times, and became a monster... almost.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-6.png[/img]

That is, if you weren't the version of yourself destined to die.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-7.png[/img]

With your forced destiny made moot, you changed your ways and carved out a new life for yourself, despite being dead. 
You later obtained a soulbot, fought in a grand battle against a heart player, married a Lord of Rage, and settled down.
Your past still haunts you and the relative peace inspires a certain ennui, but at least you found yourself.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-8.png[/img]

Of course, it took a leap across the multiverse to do so, but when you finally did, it helped a lot.
Nowadays you use they/them pronouns, and you recently upgraded your soulbot to be more accommodating to your needs.

But that's not the reason we are here today.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-1.png[/img]

You have been tasked with completing a mission, Thoren.
You must salvage the Homestuck Epilogues.

With today being 4/13, it is the perfect occasion.
However, today is also your wedding anniversary with your wife, Raine. You had planned on spending a quiet evening with her, but it seems that will have to wait.
No matter, you probably won't be gone for too long, from her point of view at least.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-9.png[/img]

On your end though, you have a feeling it's going to be a long day...

p.c: Ponder the metaphysical significance of triangular Swiss chocolate.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-10.png[/img]

Chocolate. A curious thing to ponder. 
It comes from the cacao plant, which bears the scientific name of [i]Theobroma[/i], which quite fittingly translates as "food of the gods".

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-11.png[/img]

Now triangular swiss chocolate in particular? 
While it is known to be quite high quality, its significance is something only given to it by a previous author who once lived somewhere in paradox space.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-12.png[/img]

Such significance can be claimed by another author out of solidarity or consistency, but ultimately it is merely a symbol of distributed power. 
With the death of that author within this plane, and the conclusion of the original story of Homestuck, canon's shape is left to be molded by those who seek to leave their mark upon it.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-13.png[/img]

This has always been possible, even before such a main-line conclusion, but the realization of such power is all that much more important in an age where we must make our own way forwards without an author to guide us-- to become the authors of our own destinies.

But I digress.

Upon leaving your room, you managed to recollect what you must do next, while I was off talking about toblerones. It's nice to have a partner-in-crime that knows what they're doing.

You must soon descend to the basement level and enter the garage. 
Your RV, the Eros Machina, awaits you.

p.c: :3 Leave a note for your wife, in case this ends up taking a Hussian amount of time :3
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-14.png[/img] You get the sudden thought to leave your dear wife a note, just in case. Don't want her worrying about you, after all.
[color=#c20000]"Dear Raine, It is unfortunate but I have been called upon to complete a mission today. I realize today is our anniversary, but I hope you understand the importance of the task I have been assigned. I hope you keep me in your heart as I keep you in mine. I love you endlessly. I will return, at latest in December. - Forever yours, Thoren"[/color]
That should do it.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-15.png[/img]

You have no need to go to the bathroom for any particular reason presently. 
You had already performed proper maintenance and diagnostics earlier, before Raine went to go take a bubble bath upstairs.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-16.png[/img]

You enter the garage. The Eros Machina sits in its parking spot.
The only place it can fit down here.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-17.png[/img]

This feat of mechanical engineering is only second to your own primary vessel.

It was built in a labor of love by your own two robotic hands, your swarm of preprogrammed nanites, and the remains of a wrecked big rig.

It is for this reason that you gave it the most corny-ass name you could think of.

But you don't care. It can take you anywhere. Other times, other places, even entirely different stories and media.
All is possible with the Eros Machina... in the hands of a deus ex machina.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-18.png[/img]

You open the chest...

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-19.png[/img]

Inside of this chest, you find your Santa Claus outfit!

Every year you deliver presents, for the sake of reparations to the elves you had slain when you were still alive.
You hate dealing with children, but you figure the suffering is appropriate for your past sins.

You close the chest. You won't need this until december.

p.c: kiss and hug the Eros Machina
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-20.png[/img]

Mwah! 
Oh, how you love this big rig...

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-21.png[/img]
[color=#c20000]"...you didn't see anything."[/color]
...yeah, just go ahead and get in the big rig.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-22.png[/img]
[color=#c20000]"Reverse drive, begin start-up sequence!"[/color]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-23.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-24.png[/img]

Thanks to this RV having the ability to accelerate in reverse near-indefinitely, new avenues of travel are opened up. 
As any Mario 64 fan worth their salt might also be aware of, such feats of speed can lead into parallel universes. 
But today we are not going to a parallel 
universe.

At least, not yet.

Today, this miraculous power will be used to traverse the furthest ring and arrive at the black hole at the end of time!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-25.png[/img]
[color=#c20000]"Excuse me, what?" "Are you saying I'm going into a fucking black hole?!" "Do you KNOW my history with black holes?!"[/color] I know your history with the [color=#0000ff]Blue Hole[/color]. But this one is different. [color=#c20000]"DIFFERENT MY ASS! BLACK HOLES DESTROY SHIT! I DON'T WANNA GET FUCKING SPAGHETTIFIED!"[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-26.png[/img]
You're not gonna get spaghettified, Thoren. How the heck would a black hole turn you into spaghetti anyways? [color=#c20000]"Are you shitting me? BLACK HOLES SPAGHETTIFY ALL MATTER THAT FALLS INTO THEM! YOU ABSOLUTE WALNUT!" "WHO THE FUCK EVEN LET YOU BE THE AUTHOR ANYWAYS?! AREN'T AUTHORS SUPPOSED TO RESEARCH THIS SHIT?!"[/color] Calm the fuck down! I got this! You have to trust me on this one! [color=#c20000]"...I don't trust you, but I recognize your authority." "You're on thin ice."[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-27.png[/img]

Thank you.
Anyway, as I was saying...

Our first stop is at the black hole in the center of paradox space, where the [color=#00ff00]Green Sun[/color] used to lie.

This was once the site of a grand battle against Lord English. 
However, by the time you arrive there, all of the events of Meat will have already happened.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-28.png[/img]
[color=#c8a8cd]"...Now, this is the important part. In order to avoid falling into Candy, you will need to angle your descent in a certain manner." "You're gonna have to bend the rails until you fly off of them. And with enough torque, a new route will appear before you."[/color] [color=#c20000]"...Fine. But you're fixing my rig if it breaks from this stunt."[/color]

p.c: Turn Right. It's the right thing to do.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-29.png[/img]

Alright, I'm looking to the right. Nothing special over there though.
I'm gonna go ahead and get back to guiding Thoren. 
They should be at the Black Hole by now.

p.c: Thoren: Arrive at the Black Hole
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-30.png[/img]

Yep, there they are. Looks like they did a 180 to get a better look at the thing too.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-31.png[/img] There's a palpable sense of apprehension at the Event Horizon. It is very likely that this could very well be the end. There are no guarantees beyond the singularity of conclusion. Nothing but the guidance of my word. Like, normally, Thoren would never be within a lightyear's radius of something that could potentially destroy them entirely like this, though perhaps hindsight lessens the impact of such a hesitation. Only one question remains though: Are you ready?
> [url=https://mspfa.com/?s=38989&p=35]No[/url]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-32.png[/img]

Well too bad, it's black hole time now.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-32.png[/img]

Well too bad, it's black hole time now.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-33.png[/img] Now, because of the lack of budget and proximity to the event horizon making it hard to see anything going on here, (not to mention the fact that I spent like, 10 hours drawing my old project room from memory) I've managed to draw a cheap diagram of what probably happened. I'm almost certain this is how it went down.
[color=#c20000]"You're a bold faced liar!!"[/color]
What's that? I can't hear you over the SUCC of that black hole you're falling into. [color=#c20000]"Fu[size=12]ck [size=10]yo[size=8]u![size=6]!![size=4]!"[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/color]
[img=640x480]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/blapk.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-34.png[/img]

A star in broad daylight. 
It's too late for the morning star in the afternoon, right?

Then again, the stars surrounding this world aren't how they used to be.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-35.png[/img]

You are now this familiar figure. 
Your name is not important, at least not yet.

You look up at the distracting glare. 
Just moments before, you had been given a choice, an important one that would potentially, and symbolically, decide which trajectory this instance of the world would take. But something seems different this time.

Regardless, you have other business besides looking at blinding sky objects.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-36.png[/img]

You turn around and walk back over to the picnic. 
Your friends, [color=#ff80ff]Roxy[/color] and [color=#a3a3a3]Calliope[/color], are waiting for you.

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"i'm back, just had to take a moment to think."[/color]

[color=#ff80ff]"welcome back"[/color]

[color=#a3a3a3]"so, have yoU chosen?"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"something bright almost blinded me on the way back here."[/color]

[color=#ff80ff]"im p sure thats called the sun"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"whatever, that's not important."
"i'm... still not sure what to choose."[/color][/spoiler]

p.c: Think for a moment, maybe eat a fruit
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-37.png[/img]

You stand there, completely blank. 
You've checked the basket before, it only has meat and candy in it. 

Neither one seems particularly appetizing, especially considering the meat appears to be raw and unseasoned, and the candy is likely completely devoid of any nutritional value whatsoever.
Maybe you're overthinking things.

"Pizza delivery!"

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-38.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#ff80ff]"callie did u order som pizzaz?"
*pizza
*honestly pizazz is a cool word[/color]

[color=#a3a3a3]"...i did not order a pizza..."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-39.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"]"I've got a pizza here for a 'June Egbert'. Pizza's prepaid."

[color=#0000ff]"...'june'? that's not my name, my name's-"[/color]

"Close enough, here you go."[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-40.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#a3a3a3]"...wait. who sent yoU?"[/color]

"That's strictly confidential!"

[color=#0000ff]"what kind of pizza is this anyways?"[/color]

"uhhhmmmnn.... none pizza with left beef?"

[color=#0000ff]"...honestly, this is starting to look better than the meat or the candy."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-41.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"]"I've got a message to pass onto you too."

[i][ If you want to set things right, meet me at the crystal cave in the Consort Kingdom. ][/i]

[color=#a3a3a3]"..."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-42.png[/img]

You are now Dirk, and things haven't been going well lately. 

Well actually, they've been going just fine, but that's the whole problem. 
There's no grand conflict, no driving purpose, and seemingly no true reason to go on.

Regardless, today could very well be your last day on earth.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-43.png[/img]

You look out the window, at the blue sky. A vision of the heavens, not that you'd be welcome there in the end. 

You think back to the things you could have done, had already done, and have the potential to do. The possibilities of how much wrong you could have caused seem to cement you in place. 
You don't belong here. 
Your core screams for release.

However, in this ultimate-flavored downward spiral, something catches your eye.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-44.png[/img]

You see something... something that should not be. 
A red star.
Is it a meteor? Is it something else? You don't have the equipment on hand to examine it, but somehow, this enigmatic astral visitation... it almost gives you a flash of hope?
Perhaps there is something to live for...?

You can only hope so.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-45.png[/img]

Success!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-46.png[/img]
"Anyways, I'm on a tight schedule. I got pizzas to deliver. Seeya."

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-36.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"wait, they took off with the pizza."[/color]

[color=#ff80ff]"i gotchu fam. yoinked that pizza while the weren't lookin"[/color]

[color=#a3a3a3]"yoU do realize this is a third option that is neither important nor sweet?"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"you know what? i could care less. whoever sent this pizza must have had a reason."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-47.png[/img]

[color=#0000ff]"and that name... something about it, feels weird. like, it wasn't mine, but... nevermind."[/color]

You think about that name a bit more. 
June. 

Didn't Vriska almost call you that once? You were even wearing the same outfit, though of course not the same exact copy. 
Come to think of it, it's kinda weird that you decided to wear a copy of the outfit you wore upon your ascension ten years ago.

...you briefly wonder what it would be like to have long luscious locks of hair like Vriska, but quickly dismiss the thought.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-48.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#ff80ff]"what r we waiting for? we got a pizza to eatsa!"[/color]

[color=#a3a3a3]"..."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-49.png[/img]

And so, the seed was planted, and the pizza was chosen.

What will our confused breath player find out?
Who sent the pizza?
Where's Thoren?
Is this even important?

I guess you'll just have to keep reading to find out!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/pro-50.gif[/img]

-- End of Prologue --

<iframe width="640" height="480" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TkrAZ8ceN68" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[size=10](song used: Forever - Mobius Trip and Hadron Kaleido)[/size]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p1.png[/img]

You are now Thoren.
What will you do?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p2.png[/img]

You look at the fishies. The closest ones are visible... just right outside.
It has finally occurred to you that you and your ride have sunk underwater upon landing. Fortunately the airlock is quite firm, as long as you don't try to break it.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p3.png[/img]
You examine the fish, using your technological prowess to quickly identify the fish.

[spoiler open="Show Thorendex entry" close="Hide Thorendex entry"]Jack Mackerel
a common fish found in the eastern pacific ocean. Also known as the horse mackerel, it is commonly fished for sport and for commercial purposes. Can be used as a substitute for canned tuna or salmon in recipes that may require it. They commonly swim together in large schools, and tend to be found in shallower waters, near the top of the water column. Apparently they taste similar to canned sardines.[/spoiler]

Yes sure, you quickly paraphrased the wikipedia article, but it's good enough. At least it has confirmed that you did not descend very far underwater at all. You wonder what lies underneath the Eros Machina's wheels that prevent it from sinking into the abyss... 

You then briefly wonder about obtaining one or more jack mackerel to bring back home to your wife, though you quickly deduce that it would be much easier to just buy a can of them later instead.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p4.png[/img]
It currently only contains ice and a couple of frozen tv dinners.

It's always a good idea to have at least some sort of food on hand. 
Though it may be optional for you, most guests will need to eat something.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p5.png[/img]
The bathroom sink? An odd thought to follow, but you'll go for it.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p6.png[/img]
You arrive in the bathroom and begin examining the bathroom sink.
Nothing particularly out of the ordinary here. Just a sink working as usual. Even has running water, it seems.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p7.png[/img]

You have little need for a shower right now, as your chassis is currently clean.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p8.png[/img]

You are now in the back room. 
For some reason, a treasure chest is blocking the transportalizer pad you keep back here. You could probably move it if you wanted to, but you have more important things to attend to.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p9.png[/img] Wait a minute. When did this chest get here anyways?
[color=#c20000]"I don't care. I'm opening this chest."[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p10.png[/img]

Inside of this chest, you find... 
A tissue box?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p11.png[/img]

Inside of the tissue box, you find ten printed out threads from [url=https://letssosl.boards.net/board/10/messageboard]a familiar messageboard[/url]. 
Outside of the tissue box you find one more.
They are all from threads which are titled "Charcherry Weekly". 

Some sort of online newsletter?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p12.gif[/img]

You captchalogue the issues away.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p13.png[/img]

You climb up the ladder. This leads up to the loft.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p14.png[/img]

You enter the loft. 
Soon after, you sense something has changed downstairs. 

Something that wasn't there before.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p15.png[/img]

This is your coffin. 
You bought it for yourself since you never really got to have a funeral or anything after you died. Not that there's any trace of your original body left to bury anymore. 

Technically it could be said that you got cremated, but to you that doesn't count, since the ~ATH script you wrote which you think caused your body to spontaneously combust afterwards wasn't even meant for you in the first place.

Regardless, you only use this for the rare depression nap, or when you want to be Particularly Extra.

p.c: Thoren: Check coffin for vampires, just in case
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p16.png[/img]

You peer into the coffin. 
It appears to be empty.

No vampires to be seen.

p.c: [S] Thoren: Save Game using your coffin
p.b:
<iframe width="640" height="480" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SnAvMAvTPt0" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

-- Game saved to Slot 1 --

You will be recalled here to this particular moment if you are physically destroyed or the timeline is doomed otherwise.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p17.gif[/img]

...good, nobody saw that.
probably.

You should probably tend to that disturbance downstairs now.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p18.png[/img]

You make your way back down to the back room.
It appears to be the same as you left it.

p.c: Thoren: head through the second door to your right
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p19.png[/img]

Inside here, is a very compact combination washer-dryer.
You never know when an article of clothing will need to be washed.
Because your godtier uniform is merely a reproduction of the one you once wore in life, it will likely need washing eventually.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p20.png[/img]

Yeah, probably a good idea.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p21.gif[/img]

You enter the main room, and you see someone at the front door.
Is, is that who you think it is?

How did this intruder even get in here?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p22.png[/img]

You see the face of the heir at your front door. 
You have seen this heir of breath a thousand times and yet still the first.

What do you say to someone you have read so much about, and yet know so little about?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p23.png[/img]

You approach the heir of breath and begin your line of questioning.

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"]
[color=#c20000]"...What are you doing here?"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"it's a long story."[/color]
[color=#0000ff]"to keep things brief, i need you to order a pizza." 

"a pizza for june egbert."[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p24.gif[/img]

You take a moment to think. 
June Egbert? 

You and me talked about this stuff earlier before you took off on this adventure, that one of the goals we said you'd pursue would be to make sure that June Egbert's presence would be cemented into canon. 

Now considering that this particularly familiar heir of breath, knows about June Egbert, you might as well ask the question.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p25.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"...For June Egbert? Is that, you?"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"yeah actually, but the pizza needs to go to a past version of me, with a message."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"..."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"it's kinda funny, you're a lot less dramatic when you aren't leading the conversation."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p26.gif[/img]

You again think for a moment. 
What are you and June getting wrapped up into here?
And why the inexplicable timeloop?

Is keeping it consistent even necessary when canon-jumping is involved? Or is it even more necessary than usual?

[color=#c20000]'(will you let me actually fucking think without your shitty series of leading questions?)'[/color]

fine, fine, do your thing.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p27.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"...I'll order the pizza. But you're paying for it. I doubt the pizza place takes whatever funds I have on hand."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"works for me."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"...I trust you know what you're doing?"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"i got a good idea at least. let me know when you're ready to get going."[/color][/spoiler]

p.c: Thoren: Beep like a sheep and WASH YOUR HANDS
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p28.gif[/img]

With some time to spare, you decide to give into your primal urges, whatever those would be for a robot.

Yeah, you don't quite get what's going on here either.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p29.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"are you ready?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"I should be now, yes."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p30.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]"okay, hold onto your windsock!"[/color]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p31.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p32.png[/img]

...And with that, they're gone.

Where to? who knows. 
When to? We'll figure out later.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p33.png[/img]

Having just eaten the pizza of destiny, the heir of breath seeks the truth.

Who is this June Egbert anyways? 
Is she from the future? A granddaughter perhaps?
The frigid breeze guides swiftly as it pushes you towards the Consort Kingdom.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p34.png[/img]

Why even did the nations that formed wind up becoming monarch-led ethnostates in the first place? 
What ever happened to the legacy of The Mayor and his love for democracy?

Then again you've never really been one much for geopolitics. 
All that you've ever wanted was peace. 
For now though, there's much more important things to ponder, and rabbit holes more enticing to plunder.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p35.png[/img]

And there it is! The Crystal Cave!
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p36.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p37.png[/img]

It's dark here.
Dark, but compelling.

Almost feels like home.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p38.png[/img]

A light beckons.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p39.png[/img]

You arrive in a chamber filled with giant crystals. They glow with an ethereal light.
You fondly regard the crystals for a moment, but your curiosity compels you further.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p40.png[/img]

You walk past the massive crystals that seem to grow from every crack and crevice of the cave, searching for answers.

You have to know who the hell this "June Egbert" is supposed to be. 
Of course, those beyond this scene know the truth, but sometimes one does not know their self so instantly.

And so you continue deeper into the cave...

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p41.png[/img]

Soon enough, you arrive at a bend in the cavern. 
An otherworldly glow seems to emanate from the horizon.
This had to be a sign...

...right?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p42.png[/img]

You look ahead and in the distance you see the biggest, gayest crystal you have ever seen in your entire life.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p43.gif[/img]

...and in front of that crystal is some weirdo in red heir-class godtier pajamas, with... horns?
Are those horns? They look like they might be dog ears or something.

Like, troll horns don't usually come in that color, right?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p44.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"...So you have arrived."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"alright, you better start coughing up answers. who is June Egbert?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Heh... still so naÃ¯ve. In due time you will begin to discover the answer."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"i don't have time for this cagey cryptic crap! give me an answer!"[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p45.png[/img]

Finally, the horned heir turns around.

Though they appear to have the figure of a woman, there is still something oddly masculine about them... yet not exactly.
And at the same time, their face appears to be artificial and oddly angled, but sculpted soft, as if alive.
Their piercing gaze reveals eyes that toe the balance between uncanny valley and the sublime.
A fiery crimson presence residing behind the binoculars.
An embrace of both real and fake, man and woman, human and inhuman. 
Machine and spirit.

This isn't the first time that you have seen a soulbot, but it is the first time that you've seen one so advanced, so complex, so customized.

You almost envy them in this respect.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p46.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"...Tell me. How long have you been searching?"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"...what?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"How long have you been searching for June Egbert?"[/color]

This question seems almost inane to you. 
You had only heard that name today, as it seems.

[color=#0000ff]"What are you talking about? I got the pizza today."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"I know, but that is not the question."[/color]

Who is this cryptic asshole anyways?

[color=#c20000]'(you do realize I can perceive that comment, right?)'[/color]

(hey, I'm trying to build you up here, work with me for a moment.)

[color=#0000ff]"...who even are you?"[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p47.png[/img]

The heir grins, almost punchable in their smug arrogance. They look like they could easily replace Sephiroth.

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"Me? I am perfection." 
"I am the one sent to save your world from complacency and irrelevance."

"By my will, the hands of time move in turn."

"The synchronized pulse of the hearts of the countless faithful I have connected to can be felt through me."

"Who am I, you ask?"
[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p48.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"...I am Thoren."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"yeah sure thoren, and I'm nicolas cage."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"...If you doubt my power, I can prove it to you."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"i don't need you to prove anything, i just want answers."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"...the answers you seek are within. I can guide you to the door, but you must open it."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p49.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"Take my hand and we shall enter the world within your heart to find the truth."
"With permission, of course."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"...why should i trust you?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"What do you have to lose?"[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p50.png[/img]

There is an electric tingling feeling, hair on the back of your neck standing up.
Goosebumps lifting upon your bare arms.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p51.png[/img]

You join hands with this stranger and you feel... a powerful sense of inner awareness. 
That fiery crimson presence feels more powerful than ever, but they are not alone.
You feel your own presence, though something feels... restrained.
A certain sense of friction that Thoren seems unimpeded by. But why?

Shouldn't everyone feel chained to their lot in life? 
Confined to what defines them?

[spoiler open="Show Heartlog" close="Hide Heartlog"][color=#c20000]'Are you ready for the next step?'[/color]

[color=#0000ff]'next step?'[/color]

[color=#c20000]'We have but scratched the surface of your psyche. Further we must go to unlock the secrets of your soul.'[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p52.png[/img] You're not sure if you're ready for this.
[color=#0000ff]'we're doing what?!'[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p53.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Heartlog" close="Hide Heartlog"][color=#c20000]'The naked truth is hard to bear without 
metaphor. Take us somewhere.'[/color]

[color=#0000ff]'where?'[/color]

[color=#c20000]'The first place that comes to mind.'
'To where your heart resides..'[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p54.png[/img]

You close your eyes and focus on a place that you hold dearly.
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/white.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p55.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p56.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p57.png[/img]
[color=#c20000]'And so we have arrived.'[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p58.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Heartlog" close="Hide Heartlog"][color=#0000ff]'...home.'[/color]

[color=#c20000]'You've been away for quite some time, it seems.'[/color]

[color=#0000ff]'...yeah.'[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p59.png[/img]
[color=#c20000]'As I mentioned before, I cannot open the door for you, I can only lead you to it.'[/color]
You can now control the heir of breath presumed to be June. What will you do?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p60.png[/img]

You check the mailbox... and there's something in there?
Something unfamiliar, that's for sure.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p61.png[/img]

You obtain a bag of Finn's Chips! 
...How the heck did this get in here?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p62.png[/img]

...It appears to have expired a couple years ago.

It's still sealed though!

Then again, would potato chips found in the vicinity of a metaphorical representation of your home even taste like anything?

p.c: LS: Realize that Katie is viewing with XP, with no Courier New
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p63.png[/img]

Katie... I know you know how to install a font. I'm almost certain that if you install it on your rig, it will work, even if it has windows xp as its operating system.

Here, some websites that have the font:
[url=https://fontzone.net/font-details/courier-new]here[/url] [url=https://fontsgeek.com/courier-new-font]here[/url] 

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Qc6Lh5E.png[/img]

In fact, there's two versions of xp that have some version of courier new on them, so I don't know what to tell you.

Now with that out of the way, what in the heck are we gonna have our heir of breath do next?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p64.gif[/img]

You captchalogue the Finn's Chips using your Wallet modus. 
Over the years you've grown tired of messing with superfluous inventory fluff and have come to prefer keeping it simple. 
It also reminds you of your dearly departed father, who once had a wallet like this one.

Whether or not this one is the exact one he had, you've lost track of over the years, but it's the thought that counts.

Do note that you Finn's Chips will become a ghost image upon exiting this metaphorical realm, as it is not an actual tangible object.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p65.png[/img]

You approach the door, having had enough shenanigans for now.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p66.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]'...locked.'[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p67.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Heartlog" close="Hide Heartlog"][color=#c20000]'Hm...'[/color]

[color=#0000ff]'how am i supposed to get in without a key?'[/color]

[color=#c20000]'What about upstairs? It should be rather trivial to fly up there.'[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p68.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]'...oh yeah, i forgot i can fly.' 'i literally flew to get to the cave in the first place.'[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p69.png[/img]

You are now flying.
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p70.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p71.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p72.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p73.png[/img]

You step into the hallway. It is quiet.

Even the wind seems to be stilled.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p74.png[/img]

...the door to your room.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p75.png[/img]

You stare into the darkness.
It stares back at you.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p76.gif[/img]

You enter your room.

The room is in shadow, only the faint shapes of the familiar childhood furniture visible.
However, both of the windows cast a shaft of light at the foreign object in the center of the room.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p77.png[/img]

It appears to be a mirror with a cloth covering it.

p.c: Remove problem sleuth game from rack and put it in your pocket, for safe keeping.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p78.png[/img]

Huh, problem sleuth? It's been a while...
Do you even have that game anymore?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p79.png[/img]

You manage to find... something resembling a problem sleuth game.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p80.png[/img]

This is quite possibly the shittiest bootleg you've ever (metaphorically) held in your hand.

You hold onto it regardless.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p81.png[/img]

There is a suspicious cloth here.
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p82.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p83.gif[/img]

You dramatically remove the cloth to reveal...

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p84.png[/img]

...Yourself.

You stare at this vision as you stare back at yourself. 
Transfixed by the nearly unimaginable beauty just beyond glass.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p85.png[/img]

Looking down at your own form, without the mirror, you are crushed by the reality of your meat prison.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p86.png[/img]

This figure before you is but an illusion.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p87.gif[/img]
[color=#0000ff]'THOREN YOU BASTARD, HOW COULD YOU DO THIS TO ME?!'[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p88.png[/img] In anger and frustration you punch the mirror, but the glass stays firm. There is only pain and tears.
[color=#0000ff]'WHY DID YOU HAVE TO DANGLE SOMETHING JUST OUT OF REACH LIKE THAT?!'[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p89.png[/img]

Tears streak down as the mirrored twins stand connected in frustrated fistbump, heads slumped down in defeat.

[spoiler open="Show Heartlog" close="Hide Heartlog"][color=#0000ff]'i should have known that there was no june egbert...'[/color]

[color=#c20000]'Are you so sure of that?'[/color]

[color=#0000ff]'go away, you've caused enough pain today!'[/color]

[color=#c20000]'Think for a moment. Would one comfortable in their own skin react in such a way?'[/color]
[color=#c20000]'I did very little here. I merely highlighted the bandage to be peeled off by you.'[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p90.png[/img]
[color=#c20000]'The scar had been there all along.'[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p91.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Heartlog" close="Hide Heartlog"][color=#0000ff]'...'[/color]

[color=#c20000]'...Tell me.' 
'Do you want to be June?'

'It is possible, you know. She can be real.'
'You can be real.'[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p92.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Heartlog" close="Hide Heartlog"][color=#0000ff]'my father... my father wanted a son he could be proud of.'
'i could tell he wanted me to grow up and become a gentleman just like himself.'

'and... i felt like i owed it to him to follow in his footsteps.'
'to be the son he always wanted.'
'he would always tell me how proud he was of me...'

'i lived for that approval for a time.'[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p93.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]'but he's gone now.' 'the one that's around isn't even mine.'[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p94.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Heartlog" close="Hide Heartlog"][color=#c20000]'I understand this is a lot to think about. One's identity is a heavy thing.'
'But I do have the feeling that your father would be proud of you for embracing your inner self.'[/color]

[color=#0000ff]'how would you know? you never even met my father.'[/color]

[color=#c20000]'I may have not met him, but I know of your story.'[/color][/spoiler]

p.c: Thoren: Remind her of Jane Crocker
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p95.png[/img]
[color=#c20000]'...If a man just like your father can accept Jane, then yours would surely be able to accept June.'[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p96.gif[/img]

A young woman stands in her bedroom.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p97.gif[/img]

Though it was 23 years ago that she was given life, it will only be today that she embraces it as her own.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p98.gif[/img]

What is her name?
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p99.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/white.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"I am June Egbert."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p100.png[/img]

A little while later, after a long hug, a lot of crying, and complaints about the lack of tissues in the issues box...

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p101.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"so, you say you're here to help everyone somehow? to give those you've read about over here a happy ending?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Indeed. It does sound somewhat odd when put that way, but that is my mission."
"As you can imagine, it is quite the undertaking, considering it must also contribute to a compelling narrative."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"wait a minute... does this have something to do with that "canon" thing that rose lectured me on earlier?"
"she talked about a bunch of high concept stuff that went over my head."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Yes actually, though I prefer not to limit my view of things to simply what is considered canon."
"If one does not grow beyond their origin, they will soon be condemned to stagnation."
"If one does not care about their past however, their future may become lost in chaos. It is a fine balance."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p102.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"sounds complicated."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"It is somewhat, but that is why I leave the driving to another. I am simply a vehicle in the grand design."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"...wait, are you like, a transformer or something?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"...Perhaps."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p103.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"Anyhow, there are still timeloops to be completed, as far as I know."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"great, time bullshit. what is it this time?"
[/color]
[color=#c20000]"There are actually multiple fronts to this timeloop, as both of us have a way to go backwards."
"I am referring to your ability to leap unbound across canon, of course."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"man, its been a while since I've used that. are you sure it still works?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Well, it had to have worked for you to rescue me from the bottom of the ocean. It's been preordained."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"...right."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p104.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"So after you rescue me and drop me off here in the past, we must meet again in the present."
"At that point, we can finally order the damned pizza that started this mess, and thus solidify this timeline into canon."
"Of course, we'll need to travel to the beginning of the day to order the pizza, but that shouldn't be too difficult."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"...you lost me there."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"...Let me write this down for you."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p105.png[/img]

You then proceed to write a list of known required actions to be completed by June in this timeloop.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p106.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"so first i need to zap to the ear-oes machine-a and recruit you to the pizza quest?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"...It's pronounced eh-ros mach-ee-nah."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"same difference."
"and then i need to drop you off over here to do your ominous guide bit?"
[/color]
[color=#c20000]"...Yes."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"uh, alright then!"[/color]
[/spoiler]

p.c: June: Canon jump to the Eroz Machina.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p107.gif[/img]
[color=#0000ff]"here goes nothing!!"[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p108.png[/img]
[color=#c20000]"...I suppose I should get moving now."[/color]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p109.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p110.gif[/img]

Unfortunately, the ICOSAHEDRON OF DESTINY rolled a 7, which is below the threshold for a flawless jump.
Seeing as 7 is ironically considered a lucky number, that will influence the point at which you will arrive at.
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p111.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p112.png[/img]

You arrive in... Rose's house?
Weren't you already here earlier, before this whole mess kicked off?

p.c: June: Double check the list, you got a moment!
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p113.png[/img]

You decide to double-check your directions.
Honestly, you have no idea what the Eros Machina even looks like, and at this point it feels like its too late to go back and ask, least something else gets messed up. You're a big mess of anxiety right about now, much like this mess of lines drawn here.

...fuck, what if Rose sees you here? 
What will you say to her?
You can't even think of what to do next, let alone muster the focus to zap to the right place.

p.c: Rose: Say hello to your friend.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p114.png[/img] You are now [color=b536da]Rose[/color], and you are wondering why your friend is back so soon, let alone over there sweating bullets. Has Lord English been defeated? The bulk of the visions that continue to bombard you seem to have changed in trajectory, at very least.
[color=b536da]"Welcome back."[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p115.png[/img]

While June is shambling in her freshly hatched state, let's focus elsewhere.

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"..."[/color]

You know, I'm really surprised at how well we were able to pull that off back there.

[color=#c20000]"You, surprised? At something penned by your own hand?"[/color]

It's one thing to write something, a whole 'nother to see it in action. At the end of the day, I'm just describing events I haven't seen quite all the way yet and getting them right by sheer luck, while also sending suggestions across space and time.

[color=#c20000]"You should be careful not to abuse such power."[/color]

I'm doing the best I can, okay? I just want the best for the narrative.

[color=#c20000]"Do remember that there are living people who have to live this narrative."[/color]

I know , I know. That's why I got you on the ground over there. To have someone to be able to call the shots while having a sense of connection to the whole thing.

[color=#c20000]"I would not choose myself as a candidate for most down-to-earth Desertian citizen."[/color]

lmao, the sheer irony.

[color=#c20000]"Whatever. I have a double-sided timeloop to complete. We can discuss matters later."[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p116.gif[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"roseicanexplaineverything"[/color]

[color=#b536da]"What was that you said?"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"..."[/color]

[color=#b536da]"[background=#000000]@#$@[/background], I've been dealing with migraines lately. I can't focus on everything."
[/color]
[color=#0000ff]"pleasedon'tcallmethatmynameisjune."
[/color]
[color=#b536da]"...June? Why do I have the feeling I've heard you referred to by that name before?"
[/color]
[color=#0000ff]"..."
[/color]
[color=#b536da]"Hm... quite curious. What brings you here, may I ask?"
[/color]
[color=#0000ff]"ineedtogototheerosmachinaandcompletearetcontimeloop"
[/color]
[color=#b536da]"A retcon timeloop? I see you've been practicing your technique lately."[/color][/spoiler]

p.c: June & Rose: Wait, why is the crystal ball shining like that?
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p117.gif[/img]

The two of you take a look at that shiny thing, distracted enough not to see Desertian President [color=#ff0000]Katyleen Kitten[/color] appear from another point in time!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p118.png[/img] With righteous fury you charge towards Rose, hand readied for a slappin'!
[color=#b536da]"What's going on here?!"[/color] [color=#ff0000]"Her name is June!"[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p119.png[/img]

The strike lands perfectly upon her cheek!
Though your methods may be harsh, you trust it to be a solid deterrent against deadnaming and misgendering.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p120.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"wha-what's going on?!?!"[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"Just here on business. You'll meet me properly on a later date, June."
[/color]
[color=#b536da]"...Oh my god, I think the migraine is gone."[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"Figured I'd throw in a splash potion to make up for the pain. [u]Just don't make the same mistake again.[/u] Next time there will be no salve."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"splash potion? i didn't see any potion."[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"Well of course not, it was invisible."[/color][/spoiler]

While the group discusses a dubiously existing potion, the crystal ball has been focusing light from the very familiar red shining spot, slowly burning a hole in the pillow.

p.c: TP!Katie: Turn around as the smell of a burning pillow hits your nose.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p121.png[/img]

You turn around and sure enough, there is a slowly burning pillow.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p122.gif[/img]

That should do it.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p123.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"okay um, i think i've messed with enough things here. i was kinda on my way somewhere else anyways."[/color]

[color=#b536da]"I wouldn't mind you staying a while." 
"As for the time player who clocked me however..."[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"Just doing my job here. I've seen too many of my friends getting misgendered and this is honestly the best deterrent I've been able to formulate."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"uh, thanks??"[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"No problem, June."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p124.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#b536da]"What I was going to say, is that with this newfound clarity, I believe I've come to understand the nature of this predicament."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"really?"[/color]

[color=#b536da]"As I understand it, this instance of our world has become entwined with another canon beyond our original one. This has stabilized the nature of the chaos beyond the threshold and significantly narrowed down the possibilities that lie in the relative future. This I believe is the reason that my visions are no longer physically debilitating."[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"Yeah that sounds about right."[/color]

[color=#b536da]"I will say however that while the possibility space is far more manageable, it is still quite large."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p125.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"oh yeah, i almost forgot, some robot ghost person called thoren told me that lord english was defeated in another timeline. is that true?"[/color]

[color=#b536da]"Hm?"[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"Yep, that's true. You're still looking for their big rig, right?"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"yeah."[/color]

[color=#b536da]"I am rather confused now. Who exactly are you, Witch of Time?"[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"Just call me Katie. I can't stick around too long."[/color]

[color=#b536da]"It's a pleasure meeting you, Katie. My name is Rose."[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"Nice to meet'cha, Rose."
"Anyways June, I've got something to hand over to you."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p126.png[/img]

You successfully give June the thingie, after uncaptchaloguing it off-screen so that I do not have to animate that entire sequence again.

||| ||| vvv Now you can unfold it too! vvv
[spoiler open="Unfold Left" close="---"][img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/truck1.png[/img][/spoiler][spoiler open="Unfold Middle" close="---"][img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/truck2.png[/img][/spoiler][spoiler open="Unfold Right" close="---"][img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/truck3.png[/img][/spoiler]
[color=#0000ff]"Is this the arrows mockina?"[/color] [color=#ff0000]"Yeah."[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p127.png[/img] You are now [color=#008141]Kanaya[/color]. It has been a stressful few weeks since your wife, Rose, has fallen ill. You have been checking in on her every so often instead of tending to the brooding caverns and honestly you're starting to get behind on some of your work. You're very thankful that you have an assistant as skilled as Swifer Eggmop to fill in for you while you're unavailable to fulfil your roles elsewhere.
[color=#008141]"I Have Returned Home To Your Side, My Dearest O-"[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p128.png[/img]
[color=#008141]"Have I Intruded Upon On A Private Scenario?"[/color] [color=#b536da]"Kan, I can assure you this is not what it looks like."[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p129.png[/img]

Yeah... this is going to take a lot of explaining...

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p130.png[/img]
You are now June, a few moments in the relative future, though perhaps at least a half hour in total after the red star had fallen from the sky.

After having found an opportunity to abscond from Rose's house with the tri-fold photo burned into your memory, you appeared on the Eros Machina without too much incident. 
You are just now arriving at the next point in your shared itinerary with Past Thoren.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p131.png[/img]
[color=#c20000]"...It worked!"[/color] [color=#0000ff]"i'm just glad we ended up somewhere recognizable."[/color] [color=#c20000]"...Where are we, by the way?"[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p132.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]"right outside of the crystal cave in the consort kingdom."[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p133.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"I suppose we should call the pizza place now?"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"not yet. i need you to do another thing before that."[/color]
[color=#0000ff]"you are here to solve problems, right?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"That is my current objective, yes."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"well past me has a pretty big problem."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p134.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]"you gotta help me find myself."[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p135.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"In what way? My connection abilities are quite versatile in matters of the soul, if that's what you mean."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"something like that."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"anyways, past me should be arriving here in a half hour, i think."[/color]
[color=#0000ff]"i remember i met you in the deepest part of the cave on my end."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p136.png[/img]

Hearing "deepest part of the cave" sets off alarm bells for you. 

While you don't want to make June suspicious of your sudden distrust of her intentions, you will be taking a precaution.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p137.png[/img] You pick up a rock from the ground and put it in your sylladex for later, to use as a time anchor. That way if you do wind up getting trapped in a cave, you can always timejump out of there.
[color=#c20000]"...I see."[/color]

p.c: June and Thoren: Depart your separate ways... for now
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p138.gif[/img]
[color=#0000ff]"when its all said and done, meet me back out here. call for me and i'll answer."[/color] [color=#c20000]"I will hold you to that."[/color]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p139.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p140.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p141.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p142.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]"...here it is. the crystal cave." "i guess my questions will be answered here."[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p143.png[/img]

Past June prepares to make her way into the cave to find herself, while Future June waits in hiding.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p144.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]"...and now to wait for thoren."[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p145.png[/img]

And so you continue to wait. 
While you could probably zap forwards, you really don't want to wind up appearing somewhere else again. It's worth the boredom for the sake of avoiding any more embarrassing incidents.

This really gives you some time to think about this mess you've gotten yourself into. You thought you were going to go on a quest and somehow ended up on an entirely different one. One that's so far changed your perspective on how you even view yourself. 

That being said, you really need to see about getting some actually feminine clothing at some point. The casual fare is fine and all, but sometimes you need a reminder of who you really are, you know? 
And this isn't even getting to the topic of bystanders that might wind up seeing you. You are very glad that you can disappear into the wind at the drop of a hat in that case.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p146.png[/img]

Finally you've managed to get through that cave and basically complete the most confusing section of your part of the retcon-timeloop. If June kept her promise, she shouldn't be too far away.

[color=#c20000]'Whatever, let's just finish this.'[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p147.png[/img]

It's about time you two managed to sync up.

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"June?"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"yep, that's me! welcome back."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Thank you."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p148.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"Now then, shall we call for that pizza?"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"oh yeah, that! i'm kinda bored of hanging around here so how about we order it in person?"
[/color]
[color=#c20000]"That seems permissible. We can then travel back in time once we arrive there for minimal interference."
[/color]
[color=#0000ff]"and this time you'll be doing the work because i'm getting tired of doing those retcon jumps today."
[/color]
[color=#c20000]"You have done quite a bit in the span of this day. You can rest easy with this leg of the journey in my hands."
[/color][color=#c20000]"That being said, you do know where to find the pizza place, I presume?"
[/color]
[color=#0000ff]"i know where to find one that's close enough to the park where they delivered to at least."
[/color]
[color=#c20000]"Works for me."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p149.png[/img]
[color=#c20000]"Let's be off! To the skies!"[/color]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p150.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p151.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"So where is this pizza place?"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"it's in the carapace kingdom, in checkmate city."
"its got a big pizza sign out front so its pretty hard to miss."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Excellent. Lead the way!"[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/egg1.png[/img]

...egg?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/egg2.png[/img]

egg is falling!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/egg3.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]"what's that?!"[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/egg4.png[/img]

yea you do that

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/egg5.png[/img]

the egg disappears? but to where??

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/egg5.png[/img]

you try to process what the hell is with that egg. did you just trap it into an infinite loop? did it go somewhere else? will you ever see it again???

you decide to just focus on your flight to the carapace kingdom instead. thoren's giving you a weird look anyways.

p.c: June and Thoren: Arrive in Checkmate City
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p152.png[/img]

There it is. You can practically taste that pizza at this point.
Okay sure, you did eat it earlier today, but you get what I mean.
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p153.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p154.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]"here it is."[/color] [color=#c20000]"The pizza of destiny lies just beyond these doors."[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p155.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"...hey, i got a funny idea."
"what if we did a whole terminator schtick when we go back in time to order the pizza?"
"i bet it would be an epic gag for the ages!"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Hm... a blend of both style and substance. I like it."
"I think I know exactly how to pull this off."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"really? that's so cool!"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"When I enter the building, follow my lead and stay close."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"got it!"[/color][/spoiler]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p156.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p157.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p158.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p159.png[/img]
"hey, wait a minute... you're the two from this morning!" [color=#c20000]"Then we have arrived at the right place. We thank you for your services. We must finish what we have started."[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p160.gif[/img]
"what the-"
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p161.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p162.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p163.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p164.png[/img]

"?!"

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p165.gif[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"..."[/color]

"wh...who are you?"

[color=#c20000]"That is strictly confidential."
"We have come from the future to order a very important pizza."
"The fate of the world depends upon its delivery."[/color]

"...what??"[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p166.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"we are willing to pay immediately for this pizza to be delivered, plus tip."
[/color]
[color=#c20000]"We need you to deliver a pizza to June Egbert at 3:14pm in Battlefield Park. She looks just like my associate here."[/color]

"are you sure-"

[color=#c20000]"Do not question such trivial details. The world is hanging in the balance."[/spoiler][/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p167.gif[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"Now you must listen carefully to the order, as the pizza must have just the right toppings upon it."
"It must be quite nearly a blank slate, naked crust with no cheese nor sauce."
"Only one topping must dwell upon this stage, and it can only be in the form of beef on the left side of the pizza."

"In short: [u]None pizza with Left Beef[/u]."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p168.png[/img]

The pizza guy stands there, dumbfounded by this ridiculous but oddly simple request.

Should he laugh? 
Should he cry?
Should he continue the transaction?
Should he call the police??

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p169.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"]"..."
"...What size pizza we talkin' here?"

[color=#0000ff]"large."[/color]

"...that'll be standard price."

[color=#c20000]"Your cooperation is appreciated."[/color]

"eh, I've delivered for wilder gigs than this."[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p170.png[/img]

With the transaction complete, the timeline has all but been secured.

p.c: June and Thoren: Jump back to the base
p.b: [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p171.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p172.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"we did it!"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"It appears so. With the complex loop behind us this timeline is now stabilized."
"We should be able to comfortably take a break now."[/color][/spoiler]

With most major events out of the way, you are now free to do what you choose for a little while. 

What will you do?

p.c: June: Wonder how you're going to tell the rest of your friends.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p173.png[/img]

You take a moment to think about this. It was already quite the scene when you came out to Rose and Kanaya. You're not sure if you can take having to deal with something like that again when facing everyone else you've ever met. Heck, what if that witch of time decides to slap you instead?
Almost makes you want to hide for another couple years.

p.c: Thoren: all this talk about pizza has surely made you hungry right? why not eat something?
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p174.gif[/img]

Though food is largely unnecessary for you as a robot, it's still nice to eat things every once in a while. You figure that June is probably hungry at least. 

While you could pull out a couple tv dinners from the freezer, you'd rather try your luck with the mysterious chest in the back room first.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p175.png[/img]

Inside of this chest, you find a spring-loaded white gun, a nintendo switch with a sticky note 
on it, a plate of Abyssal asphyxiation blue 
raspberry flavor cookies, and a wrapped package of thanksgiving leftovers!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p176.png[/img]

You captchalogue all the sweet loot.
You wonder if June likes turkey and stuffing...

p.c: Thoren: Return to June with dinner
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p177.png[/img]

You return to the main room and thankfully June is still there. You strike up conversation with her.

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"i'm getting hungry. do you got anything to eat here?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Yes, actually."
"Someone managed to send us a package of thanksgiving leftovers. I believe we should be able to share this."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"...thanksgiving? but isn't it april?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"While it may be April 13th here, time in my universe has moved on considerably."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"well, as long as its fresh, i'm down for a little turkey and cranberry sauce."[/color][/spoiler]

p.c: June and Thoren: Talk over Thanksgiving Dinner
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p178.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"i really gotta say, this is a lot of stuff happening at once."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"That tends to happen when timeloops are involved."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"i mean like, i think i'm gonna need a while to sort this all out, this whole girl thing."
"barely any of my friends even know this about me yet and, i'm kinda nervous to tell anyone else."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Such worries are common. However, you should not let such worries keep you in hiding."
"Unlike most people, you are a goddess, and you should leverage the respect that comes with such heights."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"i guess you're right. it's weird thinking of myself in that way though, even after all these years."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Your self-esteem will likely improve as you seek further gender euphoria." [/color]

[color=#0000ff]"huh. so it's all sorta connected?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"In a way, yes."[/color][/spoiler]

p.c: June: ask about Thoren's ability to eat food as a robot
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p179.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"thoren, you mind if i ask you a few personal questions?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Ask away."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"where do i even start..."
"first of all, if you're like, a robot or whatever, how are you able to eat regular food?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"This vessel of mine is highly advanced and designed to accommodate the desires of the occupying spirit." 
"This includes allowing for the revisit of various sensations familiar to one who had lived once before."
"Conventional food is optional, as this vessel uses primarily electrical power to run, but it can still be processed."
"Anything which is consumed is eventually burnt to ash."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"oh, okay."[/color][/spoiler]

p.c: June: ask about Thoren's ability to Connect
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p180.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"second of all, how do you do that connect-y thing?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Ah that? I am able to connect to the hearts of others by use of an artifact known as the Heart Container."
"[url=https://letssosl.boards.net/thread/59/another-dream]How I obtained it[/url] is [url=https://letssosl.boards.net/post/329/thread]a story far too long[/url] for this occasion, however."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"heart container? like, the zelda thing?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Yes, though not exactly. It was also imbued with both Heart and Blood aspect energy at some point."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"whoa, cool!"[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p181.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"...December is approaching on my world soon."
"Because of my rather... dark past, I have been condemned to annual community service."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"community service? what do you gotta do? pick up trash off the side of the road?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"I have to deliver presents to all of the elves in the world as reparations for my past crimes against elfkind."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p182.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"so you gotta be santa claus?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"...Yes."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"that sounds awesome! do you got a sleigh and reindeer and a red suit and everything?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Most of those things, yes. The reindeer are unnecessary however."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p183.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"...I have an idea. Would you like to spend December with me and my friends and family?"
"I have it on high-authority that when we return here, it will still be the same day as when we left."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"a-are you sure you're willing to have me over?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"I would be honored to have you as a guest."
"Plus this way, you can have the time you need to become more acquainted with your identity."[/color][/spoiler]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p184.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p185.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p186.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p187.png[/img]
