All of a sudden, you hear a violent impact from another room!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p188.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]"what was that?"[/color] [color=#c20000]"..."[/color]
You get a feeling of dread as you realize what that may have been caused by. Or rather, who.

p.c: Thoren and June: Enter back room
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p189.png[/img]

There are few people that Thoren knows that could topple a transportalizer blocking object like this.

The dread grows as the scenario they fear may be just beyond that pad.

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"what's going on here?"
"... thoren, are you okay?"
[/color]
[color=#c20000]"... there is a high chance that my wife may be furious with me."[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p190.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"... you're married?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Did you not see the wedding band upon my finger?"[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"... oh."
"why is she mad though?"[/color]

[color=#c20000]"... I left for my mission on the date of our anniversary without warning." 
"As a Lord of Rage, she could easily crush me into the size of a coin with her bare hands."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"...yeah, you're basically dead. like, more dead than you already are."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"...I must face her regardless. If she sees fit to destroy my physical form, so be it."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"...if you're gonna go into danger, i'm going with you."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"Such an act would surely put you in [color=#d5aa00]Heroic[/color] danger."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"i don't care. you did a solid for me so i'm doing one for you."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"...Alright. But you must promise me that you will run away if the situation becomes dire."[/color][/spoiler]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p191.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p192.png[/img]

[color=#5a00ff]"welcome home, sweetie."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"...H-hello dear!"[/color]

There she is, the love of your "life".
Surprisingly, she doesn't seem to be in the mood to kick your ass.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/p193.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#0000ff]"h-hi there! you must be 
thoren's wife?"[/color]

[color=#5a00ff]"yes. the name's Raine."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"nice to meet you raine! my name's june!"[/color]

June is so nervous that you don't even have to be connected to her to hear her heartbeat.

[color=#5a00ff]"nice to meet you, June."[/color]

[color=#c20000]"So... I suppose we should make our way back to Mt. Phoenix?"[/color]

[color=#5a00ff]"yes."
"I must say, you're very lucky that you sent me all those love letters for every week that you were gone."
"I'm not sure if I would have been able to forgive you otherwise."[/color]

...Every week?! 
While you are glad that you are largely off the hook, it appears that you have a lot of writing to do...

And a lot of time travel to send those letters to the times they were received at...

[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/ch1/lb1-oops.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialog" close="Hide Dialog"][color=#c20000]"..."[/color]

[color=#0000ff]"..."[/color]

[color=#5a00ff]"I hope you've been keeping up with the newsletters."
"there's been a lot of changes since you've been gone."[/color]

There is a good chance that you probably didn't read the newsletters, considering how long they got on certain weeks.

[color=#c20000]"...Well, here's to another adventure..."[/color][/spoiler]

[spoiler open="Show Newsletter Text" close="Hide Newsletter Text"]lavendersiren posted at [ 12:29am ] on [ 12/5/20 ], from [ AC Memorial Robotics Lab ]
TOPIC: Charcherry Weekly - Issue 19

[u]The Charcherry Weekly[/u]

Hello, Mage of Light Nick Card here. I feel like it should be a bit more joyous around here but it still just sorta feels quiet this week, I dunno.
[center]______________________________________[/center]
[u]Left Beef Chapter 1 Complete![/u]

For much of last month, your dear newsletter writer dedicated a great deal of time and efforts on a kinetic novel called None Pizza With Left Beef, meant to act as a better epilogue to Homestuck.
This game chronicles the adventures of Heir of Time Thoren Emit as they complete missions while on planet Earth C. 
The first chapter tracks a curious double-sided retcon-timeloop while answering the question of the year: Who is June Egbert? 
The game is available both on rpgmaker.net and itch.io.
[center]______________________________________[/center]
[u]See? Ludomancy Does Work![/u]

Shortly after the release of None Pizza With Left Beef, Heir of Time Thoren Emit returned home, with Heir of Breath June Egbert tagging along...[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-4_retcon.gif[/img] [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-4.gif[/img] The president of Desertia is stuck in traffic.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-5.png[/img]

You are now Katyleen Kitten, elected president and ambassador of Planet Desertia (and a couple other planets within Desertian territory). Needless to say, you are tired of these cars. 

It's always like this, every single time you commute to and from Bureaucratia for official work. You can only imagine how many more important government officials from countless other worlds across the Tadpole Galaxy are in this traffic jam with you, but honestly, the awe is kinda hard to appreciate when you're trapped in gridlock. 
Sometimes you wish you could just break the law and drive around all these cars, but then you'd have Bureaucratian hell to pay, and nobody wants that when they're trying to keep relations clean.

p.c: Katie: Feel the subtle change in the flow of time and glance directly at the fourth wall.
p.b: [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-6a.png[/img] What the fuck?! Why is there an explosion over there?! You knew something was different in the air, but this is ridiculous! [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-6.png[/img] Wait a minute... you feel something. As a Witch of Time, you've got a pretty good handle on time stuff. Like sure, it did take you a few years to get your rat's nest of a time web sorted out into a more manageable itinerary, but you've learned a lot since your days back in the SBARGv2 session. But this? This feels different. Something's different in the air, and its not just the clip-on air freshener you got the other day at the spaceport. Like the traffic laws that bind you to this traffic jam, you are bound to the laws of paradox space. Things that are destined to happen must happen, Or Else. And nobody wants to get on the wrong side of a timeline gone wrong. You've experienced that far too many times across your various offshoots and iterations. But with this, you wonder what it may mean for your timeloops, and your destiny yet to be fulfilled. Maybe its just a fluke? But maybe its something more?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-7.png[/img] Show who? Whatever. Anything to get your mind off the traffic jam. Not only is it cinnamon scented, but its also cute! It was a bit difficult to get it to clip in place considering that stock cars don't exactly have the same clip-spots as most other cars, but you don't care. You do miss your old space hot rod though... The worst part of it all, is the sudden headache you're getting. Why must being a time player be so painful in times of change?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-9_retcon2.png[/img][img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-9_retcon.png[/img] [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-9.png[/img]
> [url=https://mspfa.com/?s=38989&p=870]June: attempt to stay upright[/url]

p.c: [font=Arial]BÌ´ÌÍlÌµÌÍaÌ¶ÌÌ¿zÌ´ÍÌ¾eÌ¶ÌÍ [/font]and Garnett: Play a game together on an emulator while waiting for something interesting to happen
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-8.png[/img]

Garnett? Who's that? 
You're too busy playing Mario Kart DS with River. You are incredibly glad that your DS hasn't gotten corrupted today. This is probably like, the 3rd one you've gone through since River gave you the captcha code for theirs? 
Regardless, right now you're absolutely slaughtering them on Yoshi Circuit and you are LIVING.
Your glitch purification quest can wait for now.
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-13.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-14.png[/img]

You are now Rise Emit. Today is just another day on planet Autumnal for you. As with every day, you have a lot of farm chores to get done today. But for now, you want to check your social media.
Technically you're using Thoren's twitter account, but considering you two are practically the same person, you figure they wouldn't mind.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-12.png[/img]

You take a look and... holy shit, Thoren is back from Earth C!
You gotta contact them!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-15.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Pesterlog" close="Hide Pesterlog"]-- [color=#ff0000]flyingIncandescent[/color] [[color=#ff0000]FI[/color]] has begun pestering [color=#c20000]eternalFugitive[/color] [[color=#c20000]EF[/color]] --
[color=#ff0000]FI: holy shit Thoren is that you?[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: Accept no substitutes. I'm home.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]FI: I'm so fucking glad to hear from you. It's been months![/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: It appears that is the nature of the realm my mission takes place upon. I am grateful for this month to spend with friends and family.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]FI: Speaking of friends, we got a new memo that works best with Pestercord. #dungeon-crashers is the name. We've got a lot to go over...[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: Excellent. I shall join shortly.[/color]
-- [color=#c20000]eternalFugitive[/color] [[color=#c20000]EF[/color]] has ceased pestering [color=#ff0000]flyingIncandescent[/color] [[color=#ff0000]FI[/color]] --[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-11.png[/img]

You successfully connect to the pestercord memo. I have taken the liberty of adding text colors, despite the actual program not having a text color option.

[spoiler open="Show Memolog" close="Hide Memolog"]-- [color=#c20000]eternalFugitive[/color] [[color=#c20000]EF[/color]] has joined the memo --
[color=#c20000]EF: Greetings.
EF: I suppose it may be a bit early in the day?
EF: I am unable to check the userlist of this memo so I have no reliable method of ascertaining who may be here.
EF: I suppose I should introduce myself for those who may be new.
My name is Thoren, and I am Rise's late sibling.[/color]
-- [color=#d5aa00]sourFruit[/color] [[color=#d5aa00]SF[/color]] has responded to the memo --
[color=#d5aa00]SF: :o[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: Drat, there appears to be technical difficulties.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: :O[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: Regardless, I am here for the month.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Welcome back!![/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: Thank you.
EF: ...is that chumhandle what I believe it is?[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Hehe. :)[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: It feels like it's been a lifetime since I've seen you.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Yeah! Well... A lot of things have happened. I doubt I look the same as the Brae you remember.[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: Likewise.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Rise and I are living on a planet other than Starter. It's one I found and spent a lot of time on before reaching out to everyone. There's a warp pad for it with a lemon in the warp zone.[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: Ah, good to know. I shall at some point. I assume you two are faring well?[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Yeah! Coleman also lives here too. And, um... the recent changes I've gone through have been good. We also just expanded on the cabin, so there's a lot more space here.[/color]
-- [color=#a58a40]couragousScribe[/color] [[color=#a58a40]CS[/color]] has responded to the memo --
[color=#a58a40]CS: I suppose that is my cue. Hello.[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: Greetings.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-10.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Memolog" close="Hide Memolog"][color=#c20000]EF: As an aside, I have a guest over that could use some more feminine attire. Unfortunately my guest wears a different size than what is available here.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Oh!
SF: Hm... My stuff might be too long, if I'm taller than them...[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: She appears to be... Roughly 6'1".[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: We may wind up spending the day at the spaceport mall, though I am sure that she has many questions about our realm.
EF: Her game's conclusion never left their first planet, after all.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Huh... Well, if nothing of mine fits, Rise might have some options too.[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: I'll keep that in mind.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Is there anything in particular she wants? I have... a lot of clothes, wow. Didn't realize I had this many.[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: Hm, she's currently asleep at this hour, but she is rather... Freshly hatched. I am almost certain that her wardrobe is quite barren of affirming attire.
EF: As for her tastes, I do not know her well enough to know what she would like, despite her rather famous status.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Let's see... Most of my clothes were made with the weather here in mind, so they're heavier fabrics and knit. At least it's somewhat seasonally appropriate. I'll send over some cute matching nail polish too and I have a lot of extra make up as well, if she wants to experiment with that...[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: That sounds excellent.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Where exactly are you living? Just so I know I'm sending it to the right place.[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: We are currently atop Mt. phoenix, north of Charcherry. The only blue house on the hill above the forest.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Got it! ...If you see it appear, don't be alarmed by the mushrooms.[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: Duly noted.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: If she has any questions, let her know I'm happy to answer![/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: Thank you very much.
EF: I will inform her when she awakens later.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-16.gif[/img]

The package arrives at Thoren's doorstep, with the help of some powerful fae magic.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-17.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Memolog" close="Hide Memolog"][color=#c20000]EF: The package has arrived quite swiftly.
EF: I thank you for your generosity.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Of course!![/color]
-- [color=#0080ff]frozenLake[/color] [[color=#0080ff]FL[/color]] has responded to the memo --
[color=#0080ff]FL: so, uh... welcome back, Thoren.[/color]
-- [color=#7d3157]rebelliousNoise[/color] [[color=#7d3157]RN[/color]] has responded to the memo --
[color=#7d3157]RN: THOREN[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-18.gif[/img]

That was easy. You'll read the memo later when you're less preoccupied with this.

[spoiler open="Show Memolog" close="Hide Memolog"][color=#0080ff]FL: ...wait, did you even get the newsletter pages? Or did those get spread across time?[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: THOOOORRRREEEEEEEEENNNNNNNN
RN: WE MISSED U[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: ...I mean, I know that travel from Korous to Desertia can result in a time difference of several minutes, but I don't know about... different universes.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: ...oh hey, uh, charles?[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: ...Mai, I think that pestercord disconnected them, or something. I'm not sure. Maybe I could see about a better script to detect these things... but last time, we got false readings.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: huh?
RN: i was gonna ask if you've seen samus today
RN: OH you're talking about thoren
RN: well, they'll see it when they'll see it, but... have you seen samus today?[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: ...no, actually. I basically just got out of bed.
FL: ...I think my sleeping habits are wonky between multiple planets.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: ah, well, let me know if you see her[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: 24 hour days are common, but not common enough, I swear.[/color][/spoiler]

p.c: Thoren: Take Package to June's Room
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-19.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Memolog" close="Hide Memolog"][color=#d5aa00]SF: So! I have, uh, news![/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: :o[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: you and Coleman are getting married?[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Oh, gosh no! N-Not yet, anyway.
SF: But we are, um, officially dating now?[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: :O !!! congrats!!!!!!!![/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: I guess I should say congratulations? I mean it seemed like you have been for some time now, but still?[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: you shouldn't assume stuff dude[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: they made out in front of me, Mai.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: me and nico cuddled and shit before we started calling ourselves "dating"[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Thank you! We've been sorta... testing the waters, so to speak.
SF: Yeah, um, we decided this a few days ago. Before you came over.[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: but yeah I guess if anyone would know what bullshit emotions would be, it would be me.
FL: I still have hangups about using half of my power set, so[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: So, yeah! Just wanted to let everyone know. :)[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: ...for the record, you can totally make out with someone who you may not be dating yet
RN: anyways congrats brae omg!!![/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Totally platonic makeouts.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: yes[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Hehe I'm super happy and excited.[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: well, you two are great for each other. Anyone can see that.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: C:[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: :)[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-21.png[/img]


There. Now she should be able to get it when she wakes up.
You figure it'd be best to let her get plenty of sleep. Yesterday was a pretty long day.

[spoiler open="Show Memolog" close="Hide Memolog"][color=#d5aa00]SF: Oh, also! We're going to have like, a small get-together to decorate our tree! Everyone can design and make their own ornament to put on it.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: oh hell yea
RN: count me in[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Cookies and sandwiches and eggnog![/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: ill have to go find samus first and see if she would like to come along... when is the get-together?[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: We haven't decided on a date for it, but maybe this weekend? It was literally something I just mentioned to Coleman.[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: I think I'm unofficially banned from Christmas decorations.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: oh lmao i thought it was gonna be today
RN: that's okay! i should still go look for samus though...
RN: im..........worried[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Haha, I think it would be a bit soon to have a get together and make sure everyone has time. But you're always welcome to come over just because.
SF: Also, why banned, Charles?[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-22.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Memolog" close="Hide Memolog"][color=#0080ff]FL: kringlefucker[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: ...I wouldn't say that makes you banned[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: The elves would argue otherwise.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Well, celebrate Yule with us instead.[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: look, I'm only banned from setting up the decorations, or adding decorations[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Does that include a single ornament personally vetted by yours truly before it adorns the tree?[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: ...I'd say that yule regret it, but I'm uncertain.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: ...No, now you really are banned.[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL:[/color] [img=24x24]https://cdn.discordapp.com/emojis/749275078243516457.png?v=1[/img]
-- [color=#17c42b]atomicBreakdown[/color] [[color=#17c42b]AB[/color]] has responded to memo --
[color=#17c42b]AB: Hehehe, that pun sleigh'd me![/color]
[color=#a58a40]CS: I donât think he should be banned for a pun. Bell-ter believe they could be worst[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Coleman not you too ):[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: puns are a curse upon the sentient mind.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: gonna need to dig up my drum kit to play ba-dum-tss's for all these puns[/color]
[color=#a58a40]CS: sorry I canât help making puns sometimes. I will try to keep them to a minimum.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-20.png[/img]
[size=7][url=https://www.ifelse95.xyz/index.html](Panel drawn by ifelse95)[/url][/size]

You are now June Egbert. At least, you think that's your name?
It's kind of hard to think first thing in the morning.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-23.png[/img]

You manage to locate and put on your glasses, slowly recounting the events that got you to this mostly unfamiliar room.

Ugh, you can see your face in the mirror over there. 

You remember some kinda robot ghost weirdo called Thoren? You feel like they would know what's going on here?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-24.png[/img]
[size=7][url=https://www.ifelse95.xyz/index.html](Panel drawn by ifelse95)[/url][/size]

After making your bed and putting on your shoes, you make your way to the door. 
You are very glad that this outfit doubles as pajamas right now.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-25.png[/img]

Right outside your door, you encounter a cardboard box-- unmarked, closed by a single strip of tape. 

You think it might be for you? It is right there.
If it turns out to be a bomb or something, it probably won't matter in the grand scheme of things.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-26.png[/img]

Inside you find...
Holy shit, this is an absolute treasure trove!

Skirts, shirts, blouses, shoes, makeup, even a pair of booty shorts? A couple sweaters and a dress can be found in here too!
If this really is addressed to you, you feel like you owe the sender your life.

p.c: [S] June: Star in a Dress-Up Game Circa 2009
p.b:
[flash=640x480]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/left%20beef/junedressup.swf[/flash]
[size=7](Song used: Greenhouse from Homestuck vol. 5)[/size]

Never mind if this clothes is yours or not, you wanna try on everything!
---
Controls: Click and drag with the mouse!

Show off your amazing fashion prowess by posting screenshots in the comments!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-27.png[/img]
[size=7][url=https://www.ifelse95.xyz/index.html](Panel drawn by ifelse95)[/url][/size]

You feel incredible!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-28.png[/img]
[size=7][url=https://www.ifelse95.xyz/index.html](Panel drawn by ifelse95)[/url][/size]

You are now Thoren. You've been a bit busy with breakfast to pay the memo much mind. With the cooking out of the way, you suppose you can check the messages.

[spoiler open="Show Memolog" close="Hide Memolog"][color=#d5aa00]SF: on the first hour of christmas, my true love gave to me...[/color]
[color=#a58a40]CS: A cloak trimmed quite lovely 
CS: sorry i wasn't sure what to say off the top of my head.
CS: i know that might not quite work or be something anyone but me would want.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: I think a cloak would be quite nice![/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: It has been quite the day today.
EF: reading the backlog currently[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: hiiiiii[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: Hello Mai. It is a pleasure to hear from you once more.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: god same, we seriously missed you[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: I must thank you all for the warm welcomes.
EF: I did obtain the newsletter pages, however, some of them may have been mistakenly used as tissue in light of the lack of tissue paper. 
EF: The soiled pages have been replaced with their online counterparts and are still being processed, as the information contained within is quite dense. I am proud to hear of my sister's relationship status. 
EF: I will attempt to be present for the tree decorating festivities if possible.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: ah... so, did you get to the part where...
RN: um...
RN: ...you should come by the lab on desertia at some point... we have some things to discuss[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: I have done very little reading so far. I have been largely busy with other matters today.
EF: Hm, Desertia?[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: yeah thats fair, i wasn't exactly sure how much reading you did
RN: yeah... just, whenever you have time[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-29.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Memolog" close="Hide Memolog"][color=#c20000]EF: I noticed that the configuration of transportalizer pads in the warp zone is quite different from how it was before. Does one of them lead to Desertia?[/color]
[color=#0080ff]FL: yes the time gear one
FL: given it's the flag[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: mhm[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: Ah yes.[/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Oh, thank you Thoren! Gosh, everyone has been so supportive, and I didn't think anyone wouldn't be but... it's just nice. :)[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: As long as both of you are happy, that is all that matters.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: samus also says congrats btw!!![/color]
[color=#d5aa00]SF: Thank you!![/color]
[color=#7d3157]RN: :D[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-30.png[/img]

...You did not plan ahead for an encounter. 
Your cheeks are so red from embarrassment that they rival the reddest blush from the make-up kit.

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#c20000]Thoren: Why good morning, June. I see you have found your care package.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ....[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: No need to say anything, I understand. It's alright.
Thoren: Now, are you hungry? I've made breakfast for all of us.[/color][/spoiler]

p.c: June: Eat, you must be hungry
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-31.png[/img]

After some minor fuss and some awkward pauses, you decide to eat breakfast. 

While you were distracted by your own embarrassment, Raine showed up to take her spot. You keep expecting the power couple across from you to start laughing at your outfit, but they seem so... at peace? Is that the right way to describe them? 
Like, they're as happy as can be and cast no judgements whatsoever. 
While this feels almost freeing, too many somethings from the past keep making you think that the charade will drop any moment.

Or maybe you're just hungry and its giving you anxiety that just wants to take any shape it can find.

You dig into your breakfast, hoping it'll cure this feeling.

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#5a00ff]Raine: So, you two are planning on doing the santa thing this year?[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: It is in the cards, at least. I am definitely bound to my duty, at very least.[/color]
[color=#5a00ff]Raine: Mmm... Who was with you last year again? [/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: Last year Tempus was our guest.[/color]
[color=#5a00ff]Raine: Oh yea, with the cool rainbow chest crystal. they wound up being related to you somehow, right?[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: Our metaphysical lineages were indeed proven to be aligned, yes. 
Thoren: [size=13]How [/size][size=11]exactly one of The Fallen [/size][size=9]wound up reincarnating in that [/size][size=7]dimension after that underworld [/size][size=5]bureaucratic mishandling[/size][size=4] however...[/size][/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-32.gif[/img]

What the hell are these people even talking about??????

...Yeah, they're so neck-deep in JRPG flavored bullshit at this point that your outfit is now officially a non-issue. 
Might as well ask for some belts to make a dress out of or something.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-33.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"]
[color=#0000ff]June: aaagh! stupid stupid dumb! 
June: i'm an embarrassment...
June: what was i thinking wearing this downstairs? it doesn't even look good on me![/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: There you are. I was wondering where you ran off to after breakfast.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-34.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: Upset about something?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...thoren, take one good look at me. does this look like the face of a woman to you?[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: Women are more than the vanity pressured upon them. I have seen the inner beauty you clamor to express, and that is enough for me.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: that isn't enough! it doesn't change the fact that i look like a trainwreck to everyone else![/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: June my dear, you have only just started your journey. The look you desire is not exactly one that can be attained in a single day.
Thoren: I must say though, you show your classic Egbert ingenuity with the way you covered your hair.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: its just a long skirt on my head.[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-35.png[/img]

[color=#7d3157]Mai: Yep.

[color=#c8a8cd]Nick: I wonder if they've ever been to Desertia before.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-42.png[/img] As a note, I think its important to mention that thoren managed to get the pre-retcon newsletters for some reason. June has no frame of reference for how things had been changed. [spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: hey thoren, what are you up to?[/color] [color=#c20000]Thoren: I've been looking through the newsletters lately and I have deduced that there is a certain elf that needs my services.[/color] [color=#0000ff]June: an elf??[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-43.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#c20000]Thoren: Apparently, one of the players here thought it would be a good idea to return the village back to a natural state after a local dungeon had siphoned the life from the surrounding area. 
Thoren: Unfortunately, they were not able to stop a straggler from wandering into the timefield that they had generated.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: okay, you lost me there. you gotta remember i just showed up here the other day.
June: what's this about a local dungeon??[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-44.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#c20000]Thoren: There has been appearances of dungeons across the entire universe of Gene, built by a cooperation based in the furthest ring known as VoidCo. 
Thoren: They use such dungeons to drain the energy of the living and undead alike to sell the energy back at a profit.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: yikes...[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: Indeed. Apparently the local players have been taking on these dungeons as of late. 
Thoren: My sibling had been challenging them in the past, but before they had been struggling to build a suitable party to join them usually. They have told me its quite hazardous to enter such dungeons without a full group.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: that kinda sounds almost fun. a lot more fun than just trying to settle into a regular boring life.[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: It seems so, but I can't help but ponder how selfish it must be to pursue such a pastime.[/color] [/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-45.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#c20000]Thoren: While I assume that shutting them down is beneficial in practice, my experiences in another dimension have informed me of the darker impulses of dungeon raiding parties.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: darker impulses?[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: You know, the looting, the destruction of property, the senseless slaughter of anyone that may look slightly threatening...
Thoren: It can be rather gruesome when viewed away from the context of a game.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-46.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#c20000]Thoren: Unfortunately, boredom is a powerful force of nature which will make many do an increasing amount of erratic things as time continues on, just to keep such boredom at bay.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i kinda get what you're talking about, sorta.[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: In light of such pursuits, I feel it is a moral imperative to focus upon bettering the conditions of others with minimal conflict.
Thoren: The woes of the world are endless in scope, after all.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...you ever talk about things that aren't so heavy?[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: Trivialities are for the birds. 
Thoren: If you wish, you may wander a bit today.[/color][/spoiler]

You are now the increasingly infamous Charles. Just Charles. 
You'd rather not use your last name for various reasons, though some refer to you as "Mr. Tower" due to your associations with the tarot card. It isn't something you go by willingly, but at least it's better than most names you could be called.
Usually you aren't in suits like this, but because of Reasons, it felt appropriate.

Come to think of it, where did you get this outfit? did you just sorta wake up today and alchemize it for the heck of it?

Regardless, today feels like a day for Serious Business.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-48.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-49_retcon.png[/img] [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-49.png[/img] You are now Thoren, and you're on your way to Charcherry village, or at least what's left of it.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-50_retcon.png[/img] [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-50.png[/img] You land in Charcherry square. It seems time has taken its toll upon this once legendary home of the gods. To believe this place was where the SBARGv2 players assumed they would be able to settle down... Their restlessness prevented such a conclusion from sticking for very long. Supposedly the village only gained a name after the forest was nearly burnt to the ground! By Charles, nonetheless. [spoiler open="Show Long Exposition" close="Hide Long Exposition"]According to what you've been told, as time went on, it became less of a divine retirement as the successful players moved onto greener pastures and went to explore the cosmos. It soon became more known as a refuge for those from another world that had barely escaped The Reckoning. While usually it would be of no concern to you, you had taken part in a particularly important elf session when you were still alive. Granted you hopped in from the furthest ring and just sorta made it your own newgameplus campaign, but considering how ruthless you were back then, you feel that you owe it to the survivors to give them a better quality of life. Now as for why it became a jungle here, that would be because of two opposing forces: the capitalistic monsters that crafted the voidco dungeons across countless inhabited planets during the Grand Dream, and the meddling Prince of Time who thought it would be a good idea to fast forward everything by a hundred years to regrow the forest that had been sucked dry by aforementioned nearby voidco dungeon. According to the newsletters, the dungeon was cleared and turned into a sunken lava crater, with the boss monster having been defeated by some manner. Apparently it was so out of control in its energy-draining that voidco even sent the dungeon crashers some tokens of their appreciation! At this point, everyone had left this forsaken village and fled either to the countryside or went to go live on Desertia. Well, almost everyone. [/spoiler] But that's beside the point at this point. All you really need to know is that this forested ex-village has been through a lot and you have a duty to those who might still be here.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-51_retcon.png[/img] [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-51.png[/img] [spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"You're still there spouting exposition?"[/color] [color=#c8a8cd]Well how else is the audience supposed to know the context for everything that's going on?[/color] [color=#c20000]"Oh right, I forget sometimes that you've made a spectacle of this whole debacle."[/color] [color=#c8a8cd]Hey, audience witnesses are important for canon solidification! [/color] [/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-52_retcon.png[/img] [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-52.png[/img] [spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"][color=#c20000]"If a tree falls in the woods, does it still leave an impact upon the forest even if none arrive to witness it?"[/color] [color=#c8a8cd]Well the publicity does help a little.[/color] [color=#c20000]"...Right. I must ask something though. Do you really think that any further meddling in the public eye will improve the lot of June's acquaintances and friends?"[/color] [color=#c8a8cd]Look: Jane Crocker is still a potential antagonistic force and Dirk Strider is in danger of losing his head, in one way or another. There's still work to be done and I trust my writing skills.[/color] [color=#c20000]"So focused on solving problems that you fail to see them as people..."[/color] [color=#c8a8cd]You need to have more faith in the person who can literally write your destiny over here.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-53_retcon.png[/img] [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-53.png[/img] Don't underestimate me, Thoren.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-54_retcon.png[/img] [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-54.png[/img] You prepare your best santa impersonation. While you aren't one much for jolliness, sometimes sacrifices must be made for the sake of the role. You seem to come across more as determined, almost arrogant, rather than jolly, however. [spoiler open="Show Dialoguelog" close="Hide Dialoglog"] [color=#c20000]Thoren: Hohoho! Working quite hard, I see![/color] [color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: ...Santa?![/color] [color=#c20000]Thoren: That is who I am! What would you like for Redistro this year?[/color] [color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: it's been so long since anyone's ever asked me that...[/color] [color=#c20000]Thoren: I must apologize for my long absence. I am willing to help you pursue any wish your heart desires.[/color] [color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: ...anything?[/color] [color=#c20000]Thoren: Anything is possible with magic, my friend.[/color] [/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-55_retcon.png[/img] [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-55.png[/img]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: There there...[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-56_retcon.png[/img] [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-56.png[/img] Thoren, being very physically close to Mistletoe, can feel his intense loneliness and pain, that which can only be gathered after years of isolation and just trying to scratch out a life in solitude after being separated from everything and everyone you knew and loved. Despite the fact that Charcherry was dying, it was still home to him. Nowadays, only a certain Heir of Void has been stopping by to give some company, after all those years trapped alone by the harsh Red Dome. While he is thankful for this, the years have weighed down upon him considerably. There have been improvements with the void heir's assistance, but none that can particularly fill the void in his own heart. Mistletoe can feel Thoren's genuine desire to help those in need, though he cant help but sense that Thoren isn't particularly Santa Material, more just someone incredibly powerful who is trying to find a way to feel less guilt from a dark past. Regardless, Mistletoe doesn't care about this, He just wants to be less alone, yet not forced to uproot just for the sake of social contact.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-57_retcon.png[/img] [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-57.png[/img] [spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"] [color=#c20000]Thoren: ...Your wishes are compelling and have a devastating edge to them. Your sorrow moves me greatly. Thoren: While I am not entirely prepared to solve your problems, I can however assist in other ways. Thoren: You love this place, don't you?[/color] [color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: ...yes. it was perfect before the lonely days.[/color] [color=#c20000]Thoren: While the mists of time can often obscure our memories with a rosy tint, it is still worth using those desires to build a world worth revisiting, perhaps even better than what was there before. Thoren: The annual pilgrimage to the site of salvation is soon to lead travelers to this place. I can use my abilities to assist in rebuilding quite quickly. Thoren: This place will soon be more than just an abandoned forest, I guarantee it.[/color] [color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: ...I hope you keep your word, Santa.[/color] [color=#c20000]Thoren: I am in service to your people. I have no reason not to stray from my mission of kindness this month.[/color] [/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-58_retcon.png[/img] [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-58.png[/img]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: That being said, there is much work to be done.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-59.png[/img]

After some wandering and stumbling through a couple of transportalizers, you arrive somewhere new.

What will you do?

p.c: June: Try to buy some Fruit Gushers from the vending machine
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-61.png[/img]

Vending machine? Wait, you can see one across the room.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-62.png[/img]

There it is. You're not sure if you want gushers exactly, but you might as well see if they're in here.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-63.png[/img]

That's... quite the selection.
None of them are gushers though!

What now?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-64.gif[/img]

The boot... it calls out to you...

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-65.gif[/img]

Ugh no! You do NOT want to eat a boot! No matter how high quality the leather might be!

p.c: June: Get the gummy peach rings
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-66.png[/img]

That seems to be a reasonable option... until you check the price.
3000 boondollars? wait, 3000 [i]boonbucks[/i]?! What kind of ridiculous hyperinflation went on to make a pack of peach rings that expensive?!

Now if only you had whatever that other currency is, you wouldn't be having this problem...

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-60.png[/img]

Meanwhile, a certain someone arrives from the front door...

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-67.gif[/img]

who??

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-68.png[/img]

You take a look and there appears to be someone there! Surprisingly short but slightly intimidating.
You decide to say something.

[color=#0000ff]June: ...hi?[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-69.png[/img]
[size=7][url=https://www.ifelse95.xyz/index.html](Panel drawn by ifelse95)[/url][/size]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#a30029]???: Hello.
???: You are a new friend...?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...maybe? my name's june.[/color]
[color=#a30029]???: A pleasure to meet you, June. I'm Meika.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-70.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#a30029]Meika: How can I help?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: could you tell me where i'm at right now? i'm new here.[/color]
[color=#a30029]Meika: Oh, this is Desertia. Right now, we are in a lab... that is also a hotel.... It is weird.
Meika: Make yourself at home. Kitchen is downstairs.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: uh, thanks. do you know thoren? they brought me along to have some time to figure things out for a bit.[/color]
[color=#a30029]Meika: Thoren... I have not heard of them. You might want to ask my children, they know everyone here.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: where can i find them?[/color]
[color=#a30029]Meika: One second.[/color][/spoiler]

p.c: Meika: Grab one of your children
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-71.png[/img]

And off you go!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-73.png[/img]

Such a big building...

p.c: June: Stand in front of the painting
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-72.png[/img]

Nah. You've been on your feet for a while now anyways.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-74.png[/img]

You are now Meika. You managed to find one of your children, particularly the one who is the most "hip" and "with the times". (They taught you those phrases in the first place.)

You two are almost there now...

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-75.png[/img]
[color=#a30029]Meika: Mai, this is June. June, this is Mai.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-76.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#7d3157]Mai: Sup.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i was told you know a lot of stuff around here. [/color]
[color=#7d3157]Mai: ...I love my mom, but she thinks too highly of me sometimes.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i just got here and i don't know much about this place, or well like, anything.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]Mai: Uhh... well, what do you need to know? I'll try my best.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: honestly i don't even know what i need to know. i was told this is a lab and a hotel but, im mostly just lost. 
June: im staying at thoren's for the month and they just sorta told me to wander.[/color]
[color=#7d3157]Mai: Oh... well, this is a sort of like, robotics lab. As far as I know, at least... but i think for the most part at the moment, it's mostly a hotel.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermissionstart/lb3-77.png[/img]
[size=7][url=https://www.ifelse95.xyz/index.html](Panel drawn by ifelse95)[/url][/size]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#7d3157]Mai: The hotel bit is upstairs. We kind of have it for different reasons. Personally, my family stays here because we're currently refugees from our home planet.[/color]

p.c: Nick: dig through box for moar ornaments
p.b:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PPetjV9.png[/img]

I managed to find a snowflake made out of white painted puzzle pieces... With an old picture of my brother in the middle.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/y575laH.png[/img]

Yeah, that was too heavy to put on the tree this year.

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#7d3157]Mai: Hey, you alright?[/color]
[color=#c8a8cd]Nick: ...yeah. just got reminded of my brother.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/8mNB6Xt.png[/img]

Sometimes I miss him...

[img]https://i.imgur.com/tQBIjB9.png[/img]

One or two personal crises later, and we're back here where we started. 
Yes, I realize things are going a bit slow, but I wanna make sure you all know what this place and our group is like over here, as a point of reference and all. 

Funny thing: apparently this universe underwent a similar timeline-splitting event a while back, but with completely different circumstances, and a lot less cringe than whatever went down on Earth-c.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/lw8cJgS.png[/img]

From what my sibling told me, the split had a lot to do with a particularly notorious maid of life, and the choice to seek out this maid or not. 
After some point though, the timelines recombined in some weird event known as the Red Rift, which not only combined those timelines into one, but also incorporated things from entirely different timelines into the main one. 

As a result, some of the players have multiple sets of memories.
Some have doubles, and some have even achieved Ultimate status (President Katie for example). 

I should probably stop myself from infodumping too much at once on the subject of our group's history, because I've been known to go on for literal hours on this subject.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/ksTynkY.png[/img]

Point I'm trying to make though, is that there is a reason we're trying to change what is to occur on Earth-c, and with the possibility of change, there will need to be an anchor at which there will be no alterations, for the sake of coherency.

 The whole reason this is holding together so well is due to the methods used to connect it to our canon, as their canon was reaching a critical point of divergence.

While it may not be Homestuck Proper anymore, it doesn't have to be, and in my opinion, after the end it really shouldn't be.

Where we are going, we will no longer be trapped by our origins. Instead, we shall be guided, as if by a beacon of light.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/7ZjI0ZL.png[/img]

It appears there's a tarp covering the view.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/IEjd8Qb.png[/img]

The tarp slips and reveals the progress being made with the construction of Desertia Town. It's not done yet, but there's clearly been some major milestones reached.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/iRq8ADk.png[/img]

It appears there's a small crowd, and we've all got ornaments for the tree!

[img]https://i.imgur.com/0k27GKI.png[/img]

Custom crafted ornaments make their way onto the tree. Its difficult to convey in drawing, but that square one is actually round with two billboarded "sprites", whatever that means in this context. Prolly best not to think about it too much.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/j40DXqW.png[/img]

You are now Charles. You look out the window and you like what you see. But something seems to be bothering you.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/rVhjR1C.png[/img]

Having been metaphysically Connected to Katie in a past accident involving a heart aspect orb, literal tinfoil hats, and Ultimate Self Bullshit, she is able to sense your mood and telepathically reach out to you via the PowerCity network.

[spoiler open="Show Heartlog" close="Hide Heartlog"]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Heard that entity that possessed you got found. What's the story on that?[/color]
[color=#0080ff]Charles: Turned up in the streets. It had no idea how it had gotten there... and it didn't even remember possessing me. Which is somewhat concerning. 
Charles: Is... someone in the city stealing memories?[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/byubgYR.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Heartlog" close="Hide Heartlog"]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: ...I don't believe so? Some of us have voluntarily purged memories into Reels because they can't live with the guilt, but it's only done voluntarily.[/color]
[color=#0080ff]Charles: ...oh uh, whats the protocol for script kiddies pentesting the Desertia Network?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Figure out where it's coming from, and send a C&D on official letterhead.[/color]
[color=#0080ff]Charles: ...yeah, that's a proxy. I'm gonna have to get the old kit out.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Good luck, I'm gonna visit with Thoren[/color]
[color=#0080ff]Charles: ...is there anything that the main webserver has access to that it really shouldn't?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: It should be pretty locked down, might have a few ports into the Friendship Network though, not sure if CaFAI closed those up yet or not.[/color][/spoiler]

p.c: Charles: Trace the connection via some old uplink programs
p.b:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/1n0XdbL.png[/img]

You manage to trace the connection quickly. 10 proxies within the galaxy, 3 outside of it... wait, are those ring servers? Oh shit.
You get a ping. 
Oh SHIT, security has been broken!

You rush towards the server room downstairs!

p.c: *CaFAI: Engage 'oh shit oh fuck disconnect everything' protocol
p.b:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/XkNX5Fp.gif[/img]

You are now *CaFAI, short for Cool as FUCK AI. You basically run this building. 
However, today there appears to be a major security breach, so you're gonna have to pull the plug on some shit. 

Hopefully that keeps those nosy fucks out.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/7gMmG97.png[/img]

Meanwhile, Charles makes their way downstairs, worried about this whole thing with the security breach and all.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/KnRCxzu.png[/img]

You arrive downstairs, and thankfully server is powered down.

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#ad6625]*CaFAI: Got the same ping, I assume?[/color]
[color=#0080ff]Charles: ...Yeah. It was going through a ring server. Which implies it was Void Co.[/color]
[color=#ad6625]*CaFAI: ...Unfortunately, I doubt there's much privacy we have against that company. 
*CaFAI: Remember how they managed to get the addresses for everyone who was in that Purity Temple?[/color]
[color=#0080ff]Charles: ...Well, if they hacked into a postal database, it... might make sense where they got the info?[/color]
[color=#ad6625]*CaFAI: There haven't been any reported breaches at the DPS, but I suppose it's possible.[/color]
[color=#0080ff]Charles: ...hmm...
Charles: ...Any idea what they managed to get?[/color]
[color=#ad6625]*CaFAI: Not sure, we'd have to pull the drives to check the logs.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/9CjIvYS.png[/img]

You decide to do that.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/7im1Euo.png[/img]

However, it asks for a password, and you sure as hell don't know it!

[img]https://i.imgur.com/c4XlSGt.png[/img]

You plug his shoebox bot form into the server instead, figuring that he knows the password.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/eTd8gFB.png[/img]

And it works!

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"]
[color=#ad6625]*CaFAI: Looks like a MAC address log was stolen, as well as security footage. Not sure what footage was stolen.[/color]
[color=#0080ff]Charles ...Were they... looking for someone?[/color]
[color=#ad6625]*CaFAI: Not sure who they were looking for.[/color]
[color=#0080ff]Charles: ...Well, we can figure they were looking for someone, at least... right?[/color]
[color=#ad6625]*CaFAI: Hmm.[/color]
[color=#0080ff]Charles: ...this doesn't make sense. We know they have viewports... right? What would they need with our security foo- RIGHT! The lab blocks viewports![/color]
[color=#0080ff]Charles: ...so, who has been stuck in the lab for... I don't know, the past week?[/color]
[color=#ad6625]*CaFAI: A fair number of people I believe.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/f5dlbtw.png[/img]

You think you can just be voidco so easily? 

One does not simply become or otherwise assume control of such a massive corporation. Spending even a fraction of a moment as voidco is not for the faint of heart, considering the sheer atrocities they commit on the daily just to keep the numbers going.

While being voidco is not available (for safety reasons), there is however something closer to what an average reader would be able to comprehend and associate with safely.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/O1SHF6u.png[/img]

You are now a voidco intern. 

You've held this non-paying position for at least a few cycles now, cycles being measured by the rise and fall of powerful destructive threats to the stability of the furthest ring, since most temporal measurements out here tend to fall apart all too easily.
 
Regardless, if this weren't the only employment opportunity you could find, you would have left this hellhole a long time ago.

Today you are delivering a message to a higher-up. Why they don't just use regular-ass email you'll never know. Maybe its for the drama factor? 
Whatever it is, you don't care, you just want to be able to get it over with.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/RzXKJIC.png[/img]

You arrive at the door, already opened for some reason. You've never been in here before. You wonder how long until you get eaten by a larger creature. The rumors of malevolence paralyze you in place, seeds of doubt blossoming into flowers of paranoia.

Its far too late to turn back.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/fAwJPeO.png[/img]

You enter the dark room, letter in hand.

[spoiler open="Show Dialogue" close="Hide Dialogue"]
[size=20]"WHAT IS YOU BUSINESS, WORM?"[/size]

"Ah! I-I have come to deliver a message, from hacking department!"

[size=20]"HAND IT OVER."[/size][/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/VuwrZEp.png[/img]

You successfully deliver the letter.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/oA8CIyu.png[/img]

[size=20]"THE BREATH HEIR FROM SESSION 413? INTERESTING..."

"WE MAY HAVE A BOUNTIFUL HARVEST YET..."[/size]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/LFngn1B.gif[/img]

You are now Thoren. 
You are taking a break from talks with the union to focus on preparing the toy factory under the house to run once more. 
Yes, you have a whole-ass a toy factory.

It appears someone is pestering you!

[spoiler open="Show Pesterlog" close="Hide Pesterlog"]-- [color=#ff0000]powerKitten[/color] [[color=#ff0000]PK[/color]] started pestering [color=#c20000]eternalFugitive[/color] [[color=#c20000]EF[/color]] --

[color=#ff0000]PK: Mind if I swing by Mount Phoenix after work? It's been a while since I've hang out with you[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: That would be permissible. I thank you for your gracious gift during my absence.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]PK: No problem, figured you (and June as well) might need something to do during down time. Let me know if you need me to grab a spare controller for her.[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: I believe we should be well equipped. Your offer is appreciated regardless.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]PK: Glad to hear. See you in a bit.[/color]

-- [color=#ff0000]powerKitten[/color] [[color=#ff0000]PK[/color]] ceased pestering [color=#c20000]eternalFugitive[/color] [[color=#c20000]EF[/color]] --[/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/8I9cmaT.png[/img]

As the suns fall below the horizon, a [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ogGgoF34nkA][alt=DAYTONAAAA!~]familiar song can be heard upon the breeze[/alt][/url]...

[img]https://i.imgur.com/JjcMwrV.png[/img]

You can see the flying car in the distance. It's not the space hot rod you were expecting, but you're almost certain that's Katie on her way.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/uHnLHoz.png[/img]

With grace and elegance!

[img]https://i.imgur.com/vEu70qy.png[/img]

You land not too far from the front door, just in time to greet your guest.

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#ff0000]Katie: Heya! I hope you've been doing okay![/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: I have been doing quite well as of late. Yourself?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Been having to work a lot, and there's been all kinds of shit happening on this side of Paradox Space. Not sure if you had the spare time to read over all the newsletters.
Katie: I'm doing pretty good otherwise though, me and Mei got engaged![/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: It seems we both have become busy as of late. This has left for minimal reading opportunities, though I have been slowly working through the newsletters. I am glad to hear that you two have taken the next step in your relationship.
Thoren: Shall we go inside? I have some drinks and snacks at the ready.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Sounds great, I had to skip my lunch break.[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: That is terrible. Let's go get you something to eat.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/sAzLYKe.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#ff0000]Katie: To be fair, it's because I wanted to play Nick's new game.[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: One should always put fuel before games.
Thoren: Fuck, I forgot to unlock this.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: I'm sure Raine or June will let us in.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/sTEKu7M.png[/img] Thankfully, Raine opens the door not too soon after.
[color=#5a00ff]Raine: Got locked out again, Thoren? Raine: It's been a while, hasn't it Katie? Come on inside, it's a lot warmer.[/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/y2Fbhsw.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#ff0000]Katie: How have you been Raine?[/color]
[color=#5a00ff]Raine: It's been tough being alone for so long, but I've been trying to relax during those months. 
Raine: At least my [i]wonderful partner[/i] finally decided to come back home this month.[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: Heheh... That is quite true![/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Please don't doublekill Thoren, they're a good friend.[/color]
[color=#5a00ff]Raine: Of course I wouldn't do that. They mean [i]The World[/i] to me, don't you, sweetie?[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: Yes dear. I am glad you feel that way. 
Thoren: Now to the snacks.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/jMCk16i.png[/img]

The party makes their way to the party tray.

p.c: Talk over some meat and cheese.
p.b:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NhOApbm.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Did June wander off?[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: She's playing video games at the moment.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Understandable[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: She's quite impressed with how technology has progressed in the years she has been unable to obtain newer hardware or software.
Thoren: Most of the time she's been rather shy as of late. I get the feeling she's not much of a people person.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: I can see that, she didn't seem very social in the comic either.[/color][/spoiler]
[spoiler open="The following cannot be sent to Hepian servers." close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#ff0000]Katie: Oh, Mei is legally dead. She's a fugitive from Hepi's government.[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: Hm?[/color]
[color=#5a00ff]Raine: What's going on?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: The government science lab she was working for was trying to colonize the universe and made her do some questionable things. She tried to quit and they tried to kill her. 
Katie: So she and her family had to flee to Desertia, and she's been pronounced to have legally died in an explosion Charles caused.[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: Ah, I see. I do hope she is doing well while in hiding.[/color]
[color=#5a00ff]Raine: Knowing Charles, it definitely sounds like a good cover.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Yeah, here's hoping they don't find out.[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/hRLrh47.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#c20000]Thoren: ...So, do you know anything about how to successfully collaborate with the local construction union?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Yeah I work with them all the time, what's going on?[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: They have requested that they be the ones to build New Charcherry, despite the very tight time limit. I was rather unprepared for this.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Yeah, they don't like other building crews taking their contract. What's with the time limit?[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: If I were able to use my own resources at maximum efficiency, it would only take a matter of days. 
Thoren: However, this has thrown a proverbial wrench into the entire situation. At the same time, I cannot refuse their request as it is important for their economic stability. The deadline, I have not calculated that entirely, but it would have to be at least a week before Redistro.
Thoren: Redistro being jinglorian christmas, as they coincidentally fall upon the same day.[/color]

p.c: How exactly do you marry a lord of rage?
p.b:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/O0yk7FR.png[/img]

How does one win the heart of a lord of rage? 
With a great deal of care, of course. 

The story of how Raine and Thoren met started during a particularly low point in Raine's life.
Thoren was there for her in a time of need, and was integral in the quest to get her still-living body back from a ghost that had stolen it from her. 

Thoren had thought themself to be unworthy of love due to their past misdeeds, but through sheer spite, was determined to find love after seeing that their alternate self had managed to start dating. 
Thankfully, they had more than spite within them, as plain ambition soon gave way to genuine care and affection.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/jBTDAnC.png[/img]

Thoren managed to propose to Raine during a particularly pivotal final boss battle (of many in that marathon), when they were at risk for being doublekilled by a pissed-off heart player who had wanted revenge for all the suffering that Thoren had put him through years ago. 

Having convinced the bodysnatcher to return Raine's body and obtained the blessings they needed to feel comfortable enough to pursue Raine romantically (and possibly in other mutually accepted ways as well), Thoren had but one card up their sleeve.

Thoren asked Raine if they could marry after the boss battles were over.

It was a last-ditch effort in a hopeless situation, but Raine said yes, and it gave Thoren the strength to fight against The Scourge and free themself from the terrifying pink lightning that was binding them.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/LXkDXAe.png[/img]

After all was said and done, they eventually got married, as promised.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Am3aJ7F.png[/img]

As for how she's not ripping Thoren in half, being a lord of rage is about more than the power that's held. Its also about control of that power. 

Raine, from how I've known her, can seem a bit unassuming at times, but when she really puts her mind to it, she can be absolutely terrifying. 
Thoren knows quite well what Raine is capable of, and has been known to yield in fear of her potential. But to be truthful, she is far kinder than her title's reputation might convey about her.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/BK3AG4y.png[/img]

You are now June.

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: wow, you remind me a lot of jade. nice to meetcha! i'm june.[/color]

Katie: Nice to meet you too June.
Katie: If you need any help with your transition, let me know. I transitioned back during my session.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: whoa, really?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Yeah, this body took a lot of work to get[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: it looks like it![/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: I ended up getting into potion making as a result[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: whoa, real potions?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Yeah, real alchemy. No punch card business.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: amazing...
June: you know, it's still weird knowing that most of the people here have read the story about my group.[/color]

[/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/OFVVn7W.png[/img]

[color=#0000ff]June: huh.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/c1RhCzH.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#ff0000]Katie: Anyway, how have you been since you found yourself?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i've been... its been complicated.
June: a lot of feelings, a lot of things to sort out, a lot of things that make a lot more sense in hindsight. kind of a mess, but at least its a mess in a safe place.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: I understand that, hopefully your friends will accept the real you.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...yeah.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: So, I heard you and Thoren are trying to help everyone. Do you think it's going to be possible?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: well, they do have a lot of cool skills, and we do have time travel and a lot of re-dos with my retcon powers, not to mention they're really damn determined. i think it's possible at least.
June: to tell the truth though, i didn't realize my friends even needed that much help, aside from maybe rose who's been practically bed bound lately.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: The SGAME tends to fuck people up in my experience. People just don't tend to show it outwardly a lot of the time because of how stigmatized mental illness is.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...oh.
June: wait, i just remembered, somebody mentioned something about you a couple days back, about you being the president of desertia? am i thinking of the right katie or are there more katies to keep track of here?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Yeah that's me. There's only one Katie.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: oh neat, so you are as cool as they say![/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Yeah, I'm democratically elected. It's just that no one else really has the voters on their side.[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/qdOWjIf.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"]
[color=#0000ff]June: huh. over on my end, there's been talk about an election soon. i think i heard something about jane getting into it? 
June: i don't know about that whole planetary president thing though, it sounds like a big responsibility. how do you handle a job that big?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Well, having a secretary and AI assistants helps.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: makes sense, sorta.[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: June, I should mention something about one of the possible timeline outcomes that were written about.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: what about them?[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: Let's just say that Jane's ideals and upbringing may not bode well if she becomes president of Earth C. 
Thoren: Further measures may need to be done so that she does not achieve a cooperate takeover beyond the scope of any single electoral process.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: I assume due to her Crockercorp upbringing?[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: Signs point to such factors, yes.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i'm really glad thoren seems to know what they're doing.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Between Nick's Ludomancy and Thoren's Determination, I'm almost certain that the Left Beef timeline will turn out good.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ludo-what?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: It's the idea that codifying potential timelines in the lens of creative works amplifies their potential to be Alpha.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i don't get it.[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: Nick makes games that come true with their light powers.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: It's timey-whimey lighty-flighty bullshit[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: oh, okay.
June: wait, does that mean i can get this nick person to add a bunch of cool stuff and it'll happen?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Maybe, if you stretch it too far it might end up being a closed doomed timeline I think.[/color]
[color=#c20000]Thoren: It is assumed that there are practical limits to this technique, out of respect for the Ability Of The Cosmic Audience To Give A Shit, as it has been called.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Yeah, I think part of the reason it works is people believing in the work being an accurate telling of events. Like, a lot of people believed Homestuck as being more or less accurate, which resulted in the greater Paradox Space we have now.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: huh.
June: so no sudden sports car in my garage?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: I mean, if you want a sportscar I can gift you a copy of my Space Hot Rod for Christmas.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: eh, not really. more just testing the limits.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Yeah, you'd need a reason for the sportscar to be there I think.[/color][/spoiler]

You are now June Egbert. 
While Thoren is busy with SANTA DUTIES, you are free to do what you please... within reason. 
You don't know this world very well, but your ITCH FOR ADVENTURE is acting up quite a bit on this DRAMATIC MOUNTAINTOP.

[size=16]What will you do?[/size]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Gk3XXWm.png[/img]

You consult the map that Thoren printed out for you recently. There appears to be a wide variety of LANDMARKS upon this map. 
As a note, you have previously discovered that the HANGAR contains a transportalizer pad which leads to the WARP ZONE.

[size=16]Where will you go today?[/size]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/pQmJQAC.png[/img]

You go ahead and do that, though you're pretty sure it won't update since its in blue ink.
Oh well.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Bu8kdBW.gif[/img]

You decide to visit LAKE RIVER ROSE. Perhaps the weather might be good for a swim? You vaguely doubt it in this winter weather, but it might be a nice walk at least.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/UK183A6.png[/img]

And away you go!!

[img]https://i.imgur.com/mu4lRdE.png[/img]

After an amount of flying down the mountain, LAKE RIVER ROSE emerges into view!

[img]https://i.imgur.com/qrzx1Ok.png[/img]

You have landed upon a path not too far from the lake.

[size=16]What will you do now?[/size]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/grEHUob.png[/img]

From what it looks like, you literally wrote "you are here" in blue pen. And considering how far down the mountain you descended, its no longer accurate to your current location.

Wait, what's that in front of you? 
A pair of... elf shoes?

[size=7]used [url=http://farragofiction.com/DollSim/index.html?type=37]the smol varient (by Luigicat) of dollsim[/url] for the base of this random elf.[/size]

p.c: Morcant: Elaborate on the evils of VoidCo
p.b:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/jL4rTEs.png[/img]
[color=#f69104]Morcant: They have dungeons across the entire universe dedicated to the extraction of the energy of living beings. Morcant: Their reach is imperceptibly vast.[/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/hoBXqas.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]June: wait, all the way across the universe? how??[/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/EJGu2no.png[/img]
[color=#f69104]Morcant: The furthest ring is an endlessly vast and imperceptible place beyond places, as you may already know. There are countless creatures which call such a place home, as inhospitable as it is to most.[/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/k57iCk1.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#f69104]Morcant: Now, just a few short years ago, a cosmically vast dreambubble known as the Grand Dream manifested, and covered a great amount of the Furthest Ring, and at least one incipisphere holding one of the many instances of Gene. [/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: grand dream? how come i never heard of it?[/color]
[color=#f69104]Morcant: Apparently it never reached The Vast Break, or any versions of the incipisphere related to games connected to your adventure. It is likely that despite its reach, there are many places that it did and did not cover.
Morcant: Paradox Space is just that massive.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: huh. kinda dizzying to think about things that big but not that big.[/color]
[color=#f69104]Morcant: Indeed.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/uduIyFt.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#f69104]Morcant: Now, as I was saying, Voidco leveraged the sheer imaginary potential of the Grand Dream to infiltrate this universe in particular, and made up imaginary devices to build real dungeons with, across countless inhabited planets. 
Morcant: Each dungeon was fitted with a device known as a Dungeon Core, which would drain any poor soul that dare approach it for too long. This energy, they use to sell back to those lacking it, merely for a profit. 
Morcant: I have a hunch that the suffering they cause with their operations is the primary motive however.[/color][/spoiler]

[color=#c20000]EF: I am quite flattered. I trust you are as genuine as you say you are.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/yQIk8JI.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Memolog" close="Hide Memolog"][color=#c20000]EF: In other news, there has been progress upon the construction of New Charcherry.
EF: I have reached a compromise with the Union that should accommodate both of our needs.[/color]

[color=#5bd285]FU: That is good. c:[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: They will build the permanent structures at their own pace, while temporary structures will be utilized for the holiday season.
EF: Soon the tree shall be brought into the square, and I will begin one of the less desirable parts of my duties... the part where I have to allow children to sit on my lap.
EF: This year I will make sure the tree is not a Kringlefucker.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]PK: Kiddos aren't that bad[/color]
[color=#5bd285]FU: Children can be a handful, so I can understand where you are coming from.
FU: Although, I personally do enjoy dealing with children.[/color]
[color=#c20000]EF: So often they treat me like a jungle gym[/color]
[color=#5bd285]FU: I can understand the frustration with that.[/color]
