[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: phew we made it![/color]
[color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: uh... where are we? [/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: um....[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...that's actually a good question. [/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: it almost looks like the land of wind and shade, but its different.[/color]
[color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: can you get me back home?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: in a minute, i just gotta check to see where we need to go next.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-508.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: hmm... apparently we need to get you an outfit that makes you look like an old man.[/color]
[color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: why do i gotta look like an old man?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i dunno. something about narrative stability? come to think of it, i probably should have stolen your clothes from the future that i prevented.[/color]
[color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: wait what?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: its alright, we'll figure this out.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: hm wait, maybe katie has an illusion potion or something that you could use?[/color]
[color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: who's katie?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: oh katie? she's really cool, kinda like my sister jade, but she's also the president![/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: a lot better at the president thing than anyone who's running back home where i come from.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: anyways, she brews potions that can do cool magic stuff.[/color]
[color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: ooh cool![/color]
[color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: wait, this isn't gonna make me look like an old guy forever, will it?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i sure hope not! i think katie knows how to make it only work for like, a day or something.[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-509a.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: i'm gonna put you in my wallet for a little while, is that okay?[/color]
[color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: how big is your wallet?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: big enough to hold a car at least.[/color]
[color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: okay then, but i want snacks later.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-509d.gif[/img]

You have obtained 1 (one) Mistletoe! 
Please don't use this kid as an excuse to get somebody to kiss you.
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-510.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-511a.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-511.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]June: phew, a place and time i actually recognize! is that charles over there?[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-512.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: hey there![/color]
[color=#1E90ff]Charles: ...well shit, alright, what did I do?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: you're fine, i'm just looking for katie for a potion.[/color]
[color=#1E90ff]Charles: ...hold on, a [color=#00008B]part of me[/color] is giving me a massive headache...[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: are you okay there?[/color]
[color=#1E90ff]Charles: ...yeah! Katie should be in the lab.[/color] 
[color=#1E90ff]Charles: ...hold on, I need to look in my sylladex for something to make a sign with.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-513.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#1E90ff]Charles: ...bah, figures I wouldn't have that.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i'm fresh out of sign stuff too, sorry[/color]
[color=#1E90ff]Charles: Alright, I'll have to go in, and try and draw a wooden sign... thingy. On the pictonary tablet, I think...[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: good luck with that![/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-514.png[/img]

You follow behind Charles since you're both going the same direction for now.
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-515.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-516.png[/img]

Fortunately, Katie is right where you expected she would be.

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#ff0000]Katie: Oh Hiya June![/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: hi katie! i kinda need to ask a favor for... stability reasons?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: ..Ah. Thatâd be why my head is turning inside out. What do you need?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: a potion to make someone look old for 24 hours.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-517.png[/img]

Katie hands you a rather large potion bottle.

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#ff0000]Katie: 1 fl. Oz per year desired.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: just to make sure, this will wear off, right?[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Yeah, this is a 24hr variety.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: sweet, thank you.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Anything else you need?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: maybe just directions to somewhere quiet within walking distance.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Follow me.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-518.png[/img]

Katie leads you towards the wall between the hardware workshop and the war room.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-519.png[/img]

Somehow you manage to do that??
June continues following close behind.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-520.png[/img]

You follow closely and manage to enter the Hardwear Workshop.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-521.gif[/img]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: *DeusEx, secure delete Hardwear Workshop security footage for today. Authorization code [background=#000000][REDACTED][/background].[/color] [color=#f69104]*DeusEx: File Deleted.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-522.png[/img]
[color=#ff0000]Katie: Do what you need to do, Iâll down some Amnesics afterwards.[/color] [color=#0000ff]June: alright.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-523.png[/img]
[color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: ...are we there yet?[/color] [color=#0000ff]June: i need you to drink a potion.[/color] [color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: ...okay?[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-525.png[/img]

You manage to drink almost three liters, which should be enough.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-524.gif[/img] Mistletoe is now old for 24 hours!
[color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: so this is what i look like old? cool![/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-529.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]June: okay, apparently we need to go to... october 14th?[/color] [color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: what's an october[/color] [color=#0000ff]June: its a month. hold my hand.[/color]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-527.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-528.png[/img]

And off you go!
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-530.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-531.png[/img]

You arrive in Charcherry, on October 14th. A hundred years has come and gone from this place just a few days before.

Time is a powerful force of nature. It is neither benevolent nor cruel, it simply is what it is. But what of the intentions of those who try to harness its power? Knowing SJ as well as I know myself, I can tell for certain that they had good intentions with this stunt that we pulled together. It was merely misfortune that almost pushed an elf child into the crossfire. Fortunately, the mistakes of the past are being repaired in this mission. 
While the fixes may be cloaked in mystery by necessity, it will only make the repairs that much more elegant to the average onlooker.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-532.png[/img]

You examine the crate. It appears to have sat here for all those years. With none aside from spiders to discover it, the crate and its contents have remained in place. I do wonder if the raspberry pi running doom connected to a power hub is still running in that metal box, or if it got fried years ago.

[spoiler open="Show plaque transcription" close="Hide plaque transcription"]This time capsule is a demonstration of time itself, rather than a slice of a particular time frozen. Age shall arrive, but it will be welcomed. 
Bring what you are willing to give to the sands of time.[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-533.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: okay, now you gotta go that way into the woods and stick around 'until heads roll', apparently.
June: then you can run off down the road to the meetup point with your family.[/color]
[color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: ...until heads roll?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...yeah. try not to freak out too much, i guess?[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-534.png[/img]
[color=#5bd285]Mistletoe: you owe me a cookie after this.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-535.png[/img]

You show up to a particularly conspicuous clearing. If you ever had to build a house with your own two hands, this would probably be the place.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-536.png[/img]

The rogue of heart arrives to assess the changes.
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-537.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-538.png[/img]

You successfully make like a tree and get outta there.
Don't want to mess with the sequence of things too much, after all.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-539.png[/img]

You find a place in the canopy to spy on the action. You see Mistletoe and Charles, but who's that figure cloaked in red time energy?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-540.png[/img]

Your name is Rise and you are living on borrowed time. 
You are not the alpha version of yourself and you are glad for this, as you would not want this to be your final chapter. 
In time, you will be known under the alias of Boa, due to the feather boa you were given to wear for the sake of differentiating yourself.

A tragedy almost happened here, and you are determined to make sure history doesn't repeat itself.
As much as the regret threatens to end your journey earlier than the venom seeping through your veins, your resolve to finish all of the tasks placed in your charge is stronger.

However, something seems distinctly different, but you can't quite place your finger on it.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-541.gif[/img]

And it's a clean hit!

Alpha Charles is knocked out, by his own head!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-542.gif[/img]

You turn to witness a gruesome sight. 
June said the signal to run was "when heads roll", but you didn't expect an actual decapitated head!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-543.png[/img]

Don't need to say that twice, you're getting outta here!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-544.png[/img]

You are now June again, and it appears things are going to plan... you think.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-545.png[/img]

...FUCK, you've been spotted!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-546.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#ff9b9b]Rise: You. Egbert.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...me?[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: Yes. I know about you. I've read your story and know what you are capable of.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...okay?[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: I may not have much time left in this world, but rest assured, I'm watching you.[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: If you fuck up our narrative with your meddling, I will kill you, and it will be Just. That is a promise.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: *gulp*[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: ...You got that?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: y-yeah.[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: Good. [/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-547.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: i just got one question though. what happened to you?[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: ...Let's just say that all hell broke loose in a doomed timeline.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: yikes... i wish i had something more to say...[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: It's water under the bridge at this point. 
Rise: I suppose I can afford to ask how you got the hair-do. The stories only showed you with a mullet when you were pretending to be Cameron Poe.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: thoren actually helped me grow my hair out. not sure if you know this or not, but i'm trying this girl thing lately and it feels pretty good!
June: still kinda scary though.[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: I'm glad to hear that. We all must face our fears eventually, but the future awaits beyond our fears.
Rise: I know the perils of gender discovery, but I'm glad I managed to survive long enough to find myself.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-548.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: so like, what are you gonna do now? you have more to do than wait for the end, right?[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: I do, yeah. I've been given a number of missions to complete by the mage from my timeline. My role in the alpha isn't over yet.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: the mage?[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: The one that writes the newsletters here.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ohhhh, that mage! 
June: i'm on a mission or two myself, though i don't know who's writing my instructions.[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: ...Somehow I'm not even surprised. 
Rise: Regardless, I hope that paradox space finds enough mercy to allow both of our missions to succeed.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i'm sure it'll turn out just fine. at least, as fine as it can with you dying at the end and all.[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: I've accepted my fate; I'm not afraid of the end. 
Rise: As long as my sister is safe, that's all I care about.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: you got this, i know it.[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: ...Thank you. I suppose we ought to go our separate ways soon. Time is of the essence, after all.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i guess so, yeah. its funny though, you talk a lot like thoren does. like, more than usual.[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: We both have a bit of a poetic side when faced with the darkness of death.
Rise: Me and Thoren were once one and the same, after all, but that's beside the point.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-549.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#ff9b9b]Rise: I must go now. Another time calls me.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: best of luck, rise.[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: Thank you. You name is...?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: June Egbert.[/color]
[color=#ff9b9b]Rise: I'm glad to have met you, June. Goodbye.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-550.png[/img]

...well then, that was kinda depressing.

p.c: June: Jump to the next place!
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-551.png[/img]

Since you checked your next point offscreen, you have a pretty good idea where you need to go next.

p.c: June: Appear after you leave the room
p.b: [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-552.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-553.png[/img]

Looks like you've made it to the right place.
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-554.gif[/img]

p.c: June: Pull out the USB stick
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-555.gif[/img]

This is the thing that has the data from the present Thoren from before the retcon. 
Is this what it was meant for?

p.c: June: Plug data stick into Thorenbot
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-556.gif[/img]

[ Archival footage successfully loaded, previous data encrypted ]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-557.png[/img] Finally, something I can actually read!
Fine fine, this gag is getting boring now. Call up the builder's guild to commission New Charcherry. Make sure they do not reveal your involvement.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-558.gif[/img]

To avoid being picked up by Thoren's on-board microphones (which I'm pretty sure can monitor a room even while they're plugged in, in sleep mode), you step outside first. Fortunately, it seems the number was on the note, though likely only visible to you (June) in particular.

You manage to have a lengthy conversation with them, which appears to go well. You manage to mention that its likely that Thoren will assume a number of things, and to let them assume those things, but assert that its not their job to complete.

You also mention that a shack should be built where old mistletoe's shack could have been, with a secret passageway to an underground lair accessible from inside. Never know when that might be useful. You put it on Thoren's tab, since they'll want to be involved anyways. 
You thank them for their time and soon hang up.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-559.gif[/img]

With that bit complete, you take off towards the next destination!
...wherever that next place might be.
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-560.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-561.png[/img]

You appear somewhere very dark.
...wait, what's that over there.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-562.gif[/img]

?!?!?!!?!?!?!?!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-563.gif[/img] Holy shit... is that... is that the old meteor hideout? I can see the Beacon! But wait a minute, what's June doing back at this point?
[color=#408080]???: Heya outfielder.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-564.gif[/img]
[size=7](Dylan's hair is edited dollsim hair: http://farragofiction.com/DollSim/ )[/size]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: huh? who are you?[/color]
[color=#408080]???: The name's Dylan! What's your name?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i'm June. nice to meet you?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Nice to meet you too.
Dylan: It's funny, I thought I'd enjoy being as far away as possible from this mess when it was all over. Turns out I feel a lot more comfortable out here than in there.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: in where?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: That universe that the pawns escaped to after this all ended. I think it was called Jeans or something?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i think thoren said something about that![/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Wait, you know thoren?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: yeah. they actually helped me find myself a while back. i owe them a lot for their hospitality.[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Wow, I never expected Thoren to take a turn like that. Are we still both talking about the same Thoren? went on a journey to become The Common Enemy, died at the end, and escaped the afterlife in a robot designed for use in a cosmic battle to decide the fate of paradox space?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: uh, i think? i know they have a lot of regrets and i found them crying in their office a few weeks back.[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Dang, looks like death really changed them.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i guess so.[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: So what brings you to this ballpark?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i've been put on a string of missions. lemme read what the note says now...[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-565.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: it says i need to "take this kid to the thunder dome"...[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: I guess our paths crossed at just the right time then! But why the thunderdome?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i don't know! i'm just trying to follow these instructions![/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: I wonder if this is asking what I think it is... [/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: well, it says something about how "only one who has seen the end can begin this". does that mean anything to you?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: ...Ha. Ha. HAHAHA!
Dylan: O cruel fate, mistress of ultimate ironies... Weaver of the most stupendous of cycles...[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: uh, are you alright there?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Sorry about that, I don't think I've been okay in a millennia. I've stopped counting how many years I've spent in this abyssal plane.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...you need some serious help.[/color][/spoiler]

p.c: June: take "the kid" to the dome
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-568.gif[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: well, i guess we should get going?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: The next base awaits that way, I see no reason why not.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: do you usually make a lot of baseball puns?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: When I'm not in unimaginable agony, yeah. 
Dylan: It's hard to think of something witty when the deep ones are piloting your body forcefully so they can have access to hands nimble enough to use a computer without destroying it.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...how many therapists have you put into retirement?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: I avoid most people usually.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-566.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: so, what exactly is that land over there? you sound like you know something.[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Perhaps I do, perhaps I don't. The Land in particular isn't very important, at least when it comes to the operation of [color=#5bd285]The Stage[/color].[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: [color=#5bd285]the stage[/color]?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: [color=#5bd285]The Stage[/color], whereupon dreams become performances, which in turn become memories. [/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: that explains nothing.[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Well I'm not exactly a light player now, am I?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: What I will say, is that [color=#5bd285]The Stage[/color] resides within that dome.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-567.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: i think this is the place?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: There is only one purple dome on this Land.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: fair enough.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: let's get inside soon, my legs are chilly.[/color][/spoiler]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-569.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-570.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...this is the stage? its looking pretty... empty.[/color] [color=#408080]Dylan: I wonder if we're in the right inning.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-571.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]June: hey, i think i see something over there![/color]

p.c: June and Dylan: Examine distant object
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-572.png[/img] You arrive at the distant object and it appears to be a laptop on a table. Dylan is filled with anticipatory dread.
STAGE.EXE - Running - Components required for standard operation: -Mind energy -Retcon energy
[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#408080]Dylan: ...It looks like we have to provide this system with the components it needs to fulfill the timeloop.[/color] [color=#0000ff]June: there's a timeloop involved here?[/color] [color=#408080]Dylan: What else do you think this is? Of course there's a timeloop involved here. Dylan: Where are we supposed to find Mind energy and retcon energy though?[/color] [color=#0000ff]June: i have retcon powers, maybe that might help?[/color] [color=#408080]Dylan: Hm, that's good to know. We still need to find mind energy, and I don't know of any mind players within range and willingness to provide their services.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-573.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]June: let me check the note again... June: looks like we gotta jump somewhere. an unknown somewhere, but still a somewhere.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-574.png[/img]
[color=#0000ff]June: so what do you say? ready for an adventure?[/color] [color=#408080]Dylan: I suppose I don't have a choice in the matter. Dylan: Let's play ball.[/color]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-575.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-576.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-577.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: ...where are we?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: It looks like a spaceship.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i guess this is where we're gonna find the mind globe?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Most likely.[/color][/spoiler]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-578.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-579.png[/img]

You arrive at the site of the Mind Globe. It certainly looks very mind-y and globe-y.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-580.png[/img]

You make contact with the globe and you get a rather... curious feeling.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-581.gif[/img]

You are suddenly aware of the countless choices and microdecisions that you have made in your life. There are so many points where you could have easily deviated, so many points where you could have experienced entirely different experiences... It's incredibly overwhelming to you and is beginning to make you doubt every decision you've ever made!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-582.gif[/img]

You have been afflicted with choice paralysis and cannot move!
Dylan's doubts about your decision making skills are certainly not helping things either!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-583.gif[/img]

Suddenly everything explodes?!

June is Dead. 
Try again?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-577.png[/img]

You are suddenly here again, and also alive.

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: ...what just happened??[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Would you look at that, we're back where we started here.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i seriously don't know what just went down.[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: As far as I can tell, you got locked into place by touching that globe, and then explosions.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: why the heck were there explosions, and how did we end up here again?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: I don't know, but I can only assume we've been given a second chance. 
Dylan: Let's hope we don't get a strikeout on the third mistake.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-584.png[/img]

It looks like there is indeed something here! A lot of something.

[spoiler open="Show long note" close="Hide long note"][color=a7cade]To whom would be the most receptive: The best solution would be to pull off the oil trick, sending the explosive and globe to separate locations, without June moving herself. 

This is likely to cause the other globes to explode, and trigger another reset, but if it works, June could then head over to where the globe was sent, and pick up the duplicated globe. 

Upon being done with said globe however, it should be returned to one of the loops within Gene, as I am uncertain what a permanent loss of cosmic aspect energy would do to the frog, even if it was extracted in a failed loop.[/color][/spoiler]
[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: ...okay, what the heck is this? its not even in the same color and style as the other glow in the dark text![/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Whoever wrote this one has way too much time on their hands.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: how are we supposed to follow all these instructions before we get blown up again[/color]?
[color=#408080]Dylan: Well, we could run to first base, for starters.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i think i'll fly.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-585.png[/img]

And with that, they take off towards the Mind Globe.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-579.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: okay, what next?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: you gotta zap the globe and the bombs away separately at the same time, to different places.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: that might be kinda tough...[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Kinda tough isn't gonna cut it. We've got the integrity of the alpha timeline on our hands. And in our hands, it seems.
Dylan: Either way, this is too important to skip.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: if you say so.[/color][/spoiler]

p.c: June: do the double zappy thing!
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-586.png[/img]

Using all of your focus, you concentrate on two different targets at once! Granted, you can't exactly separate them too far from eachother narratively, but hopefully there's a jarring enough gap somewhere to separate them enough spatially.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-587.png[/img]

It seems to be working!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-588.png[/img]

You briefly wonder where the [url=https://mspfa.com/?s=38989&p=273]Mind Globe[/url] and the [url=https://mspfa.com/?s=38989&p=269]Explosives[/url] went off to...

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-589.gif[/img]
[color=#0000ff]June: aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa[/color][color=#6262ff]aaa[/color][color=#8080ff]aa[/color][color=#b3b3ff]a[/color][color=#d9d9ff]a[/color][color=#eaeaff]-[/color]
June is dead. Try again?

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-590.gif[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: -aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!![/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: You can calm down, we're fine now.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i hate explosions! i hate explosions! i'm sick and tired of dying in explosions![/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: It was only twice.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: [i]ONLY[/i] TWICE?! i never want to die in an explosion ever again![/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-591.png[/img]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Our work here is finished, you don't have to worry anymore. Dylan: Let's go retrieve that foul ball.[/color] [color=#0000ff]June: ...fine.[/color]

p.c: June: jump to Mind Globe location
p.b: [img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-592.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-593.png[/img]

You're trying!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-594.gif[/img]

It appears someone has pinged you on pestercord! It is a very good thing that you have a hands-free and virtually invisible computing solution!

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-597.gif[/img]

Fortunately, your baseball mitt modus is well suited for handling round objects of most sizes.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-598.gif[/img] When you need it, all you gotta do is recall the mitt and throw the captchalogue ball.
[color=#0000ff]June: you got it?[/color] [color=#408080]Dylan: Yep![/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/afterretcon/lb3-599.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: awesome![/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Now let's return to the Dream Dome.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: dream dome? i thought it was the thunder dome.[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: The sign out front was just a joke made by one of the lost pawns. If anything, the dream dome is the opposite of the thunderdome for the most part.
Dylan: One will enter, two will leave.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i don't get it, but whatever, let's go.[/color][/spoiler]
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-600.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-601.png[/img] You successfully arrive back at the Dream Dome.
[color=#0000ff]June: ...wait a minute, when did those get here?[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-602.png[/img]
Your tasks here are almost finished. Captchalogue this paper and the flash drive to send to yourself. Then you may continue setting up The Stage.
[color=#0000ff]June: wait, so this is how i got these things?[/color] [color=#408080]Dylan: It appears so.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-603.png[/img]

Easy as pie.

p.c: June: Send it off to the beginning of your journey
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-604.png[/img]

And with that, the knot of destiny is securely tied... for you end, at least.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-605.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: alright, that takes care of that. is it just me, or is this place getting more stuff in it?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: It pulls from our subconscious. It is only expected that elements from recent places will appear.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: ...we aren't gonna get blown up again, are we?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Only with strong rumination will the deadly explosions return.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: that's reeeal comforting.
June: so, i guess we just gotta get the mind-y ball over there and then i gotta stand somewhere?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Something like that. We may need to imagine proper equipment for this to work. [/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: i can imagine the globe back on that carrying stand, but what about for me and my retcon stuff?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: I'll think of a conduit you can use.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-606.gif[/img]

With your vast and expansive imagination, you conjure an esoteric workstation from which The Stage will emerge.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-607.png[/img]

You have manifested the Field of Dreams!

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: ...huh.[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Alright. You see that tee at home base? that's your conduit. Over there at second base is a replica of the thing that was holding the mind globe in place. 
Dylan: I need you to focus your power while making contact with the conduit, got it?[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: got it.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-608.gif[/img]
[color=#0000ff]June: wait, so if you built it, then who's showing up?[/color] [color=#408080]Dylan: At this point, only those beyond us know the answer to that. For now, we must set The Stage.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-609.png[/img] You begin to focus your power through the Conduit Tee. Meanwhile, the Mind Globe is also being utilized for its power. You feel... echoes of memories that aren't yours in the slightest. They seem to belong to one person in particular, and yet also countless. Its... hard to tell. A name that has been stricken from the record enters your awareness for a moment, only to be replaced by a far less crigeworthy name. Two of them, actually. [color=#ff0000]Rise[/color] and [color=#c20000]Thoren[/color]. Each of them took their own journey through life, yet only one of them survived. Alas, Thoren was destined to meet their end upon completing their journey to become a timespace doubletier. The one you know now is but a ghost of their former self, restrained by the shackles of the flawlessly deadly machine that they now call their home. The one that achieved their dreams had also lost their soul, and reached a point of no return. Fortunately you never had to meet that dreadful figure. Rise however, had the luxury of evading such a fate, and was allowed to quit their spiraling path to darkness in exchange for a chance to heal from past session-caused trauma. The Rise you met in times of peace was somewhat charismatic but seemed to be almost on the edge of restlessness. The one you met in times of undone crisis seemed to have a boundless sense of determination, despite their failing health. Despite their diverging paths, it is all too apparent that they were all once the same morbidly curious outcast. And if they did not gain the knowledge to obtain the game early enough, they would have met their end at the hands of a meteor, with open arms. ...Wait, why are you privy to such things? Is this the work of the Mind Globe? There's gotta be more to this.
[color=#0000ff]June: hey, am i supposed to be knowing a lot of things right now?[/color] [color=#408080]Dylan: That must mean its working! Push harder![/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-610.png[/img]

You concentrate harder.
Soon the entire past scope of the time heir's potential actions are revealed to you. 
It makes you wonder, what is so important about Rise and Thoren anyways? Are their personal struggles against their inner darkness really so compelling that it need be subject to near-divine intervention? 

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#0000ff]June: hey... what's the big deal with rise and thoren anyways? 
June: like, i've met them both, but why are they showing up in so many visions this thing is giving me?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: This dome, and The Stage it will soon house was built to ensure their individual paths as simultaneously canon. 
Dylan: Thoren's path is needed so that the Common Enemy can set this entire saga into action, and Rise's path is a reward to The Greater Heir, allowing them to live a better life than they were forced to. Also to allow the Gene universe to exist, as Thoren's path did not allow for that to happen.[/color]
[color=#0000ff]June: that sounds pretty complicated, and i'm not sure if i like the idea of rise being treated as some kinda "reward" when thoren still suffers every day.
June: ...but if its what's needed to make sure they both exist, i'm all for it.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-611.png[/img]

[color=#0000ff]"i do owe thoren for helping me find myself, after all."[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-612.png[/img]
[color=#408080]Dylan: ...it actually worked! Dylan: Where did June go though?[/color] [color=#386276]???: *clap clap clap.* Excellent show.[/color] [color=#408080]Dylan: ?! Who's there?![/color]
> [url=https://mspfa.com/?s=45532&p=28][img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/prologueother/ducttape.png[/img] ((June: reappear...?))[/url]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-613.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#386276]???: It matters not who I am. What really matters is what awaits you.[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: What are you even talking about?[/color]
[color=#386276]???: I am here to offer you a lucrative career path. You have proven yourself to be quite capable, Dylan.[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: ...How, how do you know my name?[/color]
[color=#386276]???: I know a lot of things. I have eyes in places that one should never look. [/color]
[color=#386276]???: And besides, who do you think wrote all of those glow in the dark messages?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: Even that blue one?[/color]
[color=#386276]???: ...Aside from the blue one, that was an outsider.[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/nonepizza/wintermission600/lb3-614.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Show Dialoglog" close="Hide Dialoglog"][color=#408080]Dylan: ...What kinda job offering is it?[/color]
[color=#386276]???: Business. Economics. Management. [/color]
[color=#386276]???: Know these and the world's riches will be yours for the taking.[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: What makes you think I give a flying fuck about money?[/color]
[color=#386276]???: I don't. But I know what you really want.[/color]
[color=#386276]???: Power. Recognition. Purpose.[/color]
[color=#386276]???: You wish for a life beyond the pastoral happy ending that's been handed to you.[/color]
[color=#386276]???: Why else did you escape back to the furthest ring?[/color]
[color=#408080]Dylan: ...[/color]
[color=#386276]???: What else do you have to spend your time with anyways? [/color]
[color=#386276]???: Eventually you will get tired of defining yourself as "that kid who really likes baseball". [/color]
[color=#386276]???: Eventually you will get tired of being completely unimportant.[/color]
[color=#386276]???: Eventually you will crave something greater.[/color]
[/spoiler]

p.c: Contemporary reader: React to these developments
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest0.png[/img]

You are now Rise Emit, as of October 17th, 2022, and you are angry at what you see. 

You can't just let something like this just happen without doing anything about it! Fortunately, you have the means to step in and stop what looks like an evil recruitment plot.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest1.png[/img]

After some discussion with your friends, you decide to build a party to travel across time and space, to the accursed realm where this is going on. 
You start off with traveling to The Land of Meteors and Gospel, which orbits Starter Planet. 
Accompanying you so far, is your friend and pokemon training rival Jovin. Fortunately, your plague doctor mask can summon doors to places you know relatively well. Since this was where Thoren and Raine had their wedding years ago, the memory stuck well enough for you to summon this door.

Granted, it was hard to open with the additional foliage that's run rampant over the years of abandonment, but Jovin's rage was able to push it open with... worrying ease.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest2.png[/img]

After some stumbling and bumbling in the thicket, you and Jovin find the entrance to the Dream Dome, a concrete sphere filled with dreambubble medium. 

[color=#ff0000]"...There it is."
"...Are you ready to enter? Remember we'll be entering a dreambubble zone."[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]"Wait we ar-oh yeah you mentioned that..."
 "It will be interesting, thats for sure. I never really did dream bubble shenanigans, so will be interesting, and yeah I'll be ready in case things go south... or north... or east... or any direction thats bad... but yeah, I'm ready for things to go well, and ready for things to go wrong... if that makes sense."[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"I'm sure we can handle this."[/color]

There is a moment of hesitation, but soon you two enter.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest3.png[/img]

Inside of the dome is darkness.
You take a moment to focus your thoughts. They hold out their hand and summon a magical flame. Rock walls are revealed, stones of all sizes within vision. Even a few zubat can be seen flapping their wings in this inky darkness. Jovin seems reflexively annoyed at the zubats.

[color=#ff0000]"Alright. We should be able to make the jump from here."[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]"Yeah, I don't doubt that. ya pretty good at stuff like this."[/color]

Rise offers their free hand.
[color=#ff0000]"Hold on, we'll need to stay close together for this jump. This dome has gone quite far across time and space, and we can't afford to be separated."[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]"Yeah thats a good idea... I get lost enough in space, I don't need to get lost in time as well"[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest3a.png[/img]

Using the dome's location as a temporal anchor, you use your time powers to go back ten years into the past with Jovin in tow. A spell circle surrounds you both and all is bathed with red light.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest3b.png[/img]

The red light fades and you are no longer in a dark cave of zubats.
You and Jovin are now in a white, nearly featureless void. 
The only feature appears to be a distant hallway leading into darkness.

[color=#ff0000]"...fuck, did we go too far back?"[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]"...Huh. Least there are no Zubats even if we seem to be in an empty void... and have no clue, your the time traveler... but have a feeling we came at the right time" [/color]

You decide to contact the past version of Hazel, who present Hazel had suggested you recruit in this time.
Because this version of her was before she transitioned, he will be referred to by his chumhandle, rechargedNintendo. Permission was granted to use previous pronouns in regers to the past version of RN.
[spoiler open="Show Pesterlog" close="Hide Pesterlog"]-- [color=#ff0000]flyingIncandescent[/color] [[color=#ff0000]FI[/color]] has begun pestering [color=#00ff00]rechargedNintendo[/color] [[color=#00ff00]RN[/color]] --
[color=#ff0000]FI: Hey, RN. I've got a mission for you. I'm from the future and someone you're destined to save is in danger.
FI: I need your help. Come to the dream dome if you're up to the task.
FI: also, if you think you know my name, don't use it. It's got causal spoilers. Just call me FI. And no, I'm not the spirit of the master sword. [/color]
[color=#00ff00]RN: :3 Love to help, but where is this âdream domeâ? :3
RN: :3 Is it a location on that snowy land we havenât found yet? :3[/color][/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest4.png[/img]

You exit the dream dome. The air is cold out here. 
You are no longer on the Land of Meteors and Gospel. Instead you are on the Land of Frost and Spheres.
The date is October 10th, 2012, just hours after the last batch of dream mist was deposited into the dome.

Not too far away there is a rather new looking sign declaring this place to be "The Thunder Dome". There's also one key difference.
The dome is white instead of purple.

[color=#ff0000]"...what the fuck, the dome isn't even purple anymore?"[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]âHuhâ¦ wasnt expecting coldâ¦ and guessing we be there before it became purpleâ¦ looks brand newâ[/color]

p.c: Jovin: Give Rise something better to wear
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest4a.png[/img]

You hand Rise a scarf and a blanket. Rise quickly fashions it into something suitable for the weather.

[color=#ff0000]"Thank you."[/color]

[spoiler open="Show Pesterlog" close="Hide Pesterlog"][color=#ff0000]FI: It looks like its been found, I found a sign out front that says "the thunder dome".
FI: Do you like, not spend that much time with the others over there?[/color]
[color=#00ff00]RN: :3 I mean, if something has been found itâd be on the rewardificator board I think? :3[/color]
[color=#ff0000]FI: But yeah, its pretty damn cold out here. Be careful.[/color]
[color=#00ff00]RN: :3 Iâll see if I can find you though. :3[/color]
[color=#ff0000]FI: Also, are there any plans to paint this thing? In my time its purple.[/color]
-- [color=#00ff00]rechargedNintendo[/color] [[color=#00ff00]RN[/color]] has ceased responding to [color=#ff0000]flyingIncandescent[/color] [[color=#ff0000]FI[/color]] --
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest5.png[/img]

Having used heat seeking technology in your suit, You arrive at the front of the dream dome.
You did not expect two people, let alone one of them which looks uncannily similar to a known enemy. They seem rather nervous.

[color=#00ff00]âOh, thereâs two of you.â[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]"Nice armor, and uh yeah nice to see ya again... or in this case meet ya"[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"...Hello. I'm FI, the one who pestered you. This is my friend, he uses the chuminitials FF."[/color]

[color=#00ff00]âSorry, you reminded me of someone for a second. So, FI and FF, got it. Whatâs the situation?â[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]âDonât worry, FI be chill. We be here to help a fella whoâs in danger in ya time.â
âkinda forgot the horn thing and what it meant in this eraâ¦â[/color]

Rise takes a moment to try and take some deep breaths. Fortunately, between Jovin standing there protectively and Brae offering moral support across The Network, this manages to be easier to handle.

[color=#ff0000]"...Yeah. There is a void player by the name of Dylan who's in danger. I'm not sure if you've heard of them yet, but there's a company called Voidco that's trying to recruit him. Voidco is bad news, especially in the time after The Escape here."[/color]
Rise tries to only give the minimal amount of spoilers for the sake of clarification. RN is an heir of hope, so it should be alright to say these things.
[color=#ff0000]"One issue though, is that we may have gone back a little too far in the past."[/color]

[color=#00ff00]"Yeah, it seems like you're a bit too early. Since I'm pretty sure we haven't found this place yet,"[/color] he says, looking at the Dome. [color=#00ff00]"You said it's supposed to be purple, right?"[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]âLovelyâ¦ sorry bout this R-FI. I seem to always make us lostâ¦ and guessing itâs time loop bs why the dome is purple, effect coming before the causeâ¦ what do we do, FI?â[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"Hmm... I suppose this gives us time to prepare for the confrontation. It's always better to be early than late, after all. Only question is, how off are we?"[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest5a.png[/img]

You open up the crusty old Chumdroid app on your phone and enter the lost pawns's memo with a generic default handle.

Fortunately, the timebar option is active, allowing them to scroll back quite far through the past and future of the memo. However, their ability to post there has been disabled for some reason. You cringe at the instance of your deadname present in one of the messages. Instances of the deadname have been redacted out of respect.

This predictably takes a while.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest4b.png[/img]

[color=#ff0000]"...I may have found a range of dates. By the 17th,[/color] [color=#800080]The Stage[/color] [color=#ff0000]will be noted to be purple. On the 14th, a number of pawns will visit. Since today is the 10th, that isn't too far away, but it may be best to jump ahead to after the memo-users visited this place visited."[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]"You know this time the best... And yeah, the less time we spend in this time, the better, mostly cause it means less time for things to go sideways."[/color]

If it doesn't..."[/color] Rise glances away, trying to think about the implications of a doomed timeline in the furthest ring. The possibilities are too heavy to ponder. [color=#ff0000]"...well, I'd rather not think of that."[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]"if ya don't feel up to helping I understand, but.... having three heads together would be good. And yeah... don't blame ya on not wanting to think of that."[/color]

[color=#00ff00]âSure, Iâm willing to help. No point being alive out here if I canât make a difference once in a while.â[/color] He says, with a twinge of survivorâs guilt.

Jovin blinks before nodding at them. [color=#c6bc9f]"Thanks! and yeah get that... but pretty sure ya going to be a big help- not cause of time stuff but just a feeling"[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"...also, I'm sorry if I'm being a bit snappy, time missions tend to get me on edge sometimes."[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]"You are handling it pretty well! Then again, I tend to avoid time missions in general cause they tend to freak me out... time travel and time bullshit in general does..."[/color] 
For a moment he seems to be thinking about something else, shivering and sparking purple for a second before refocusing.

[color=#ff0000]"Considering how Dylan knows you, RN, your voice is likely going to have the strongest sway on him."
"So, should we jump directly to the 14th, or jump to the 13th and wait until a sign appears while somewhere out of view?"[/color]

[color=#00ff00]âI mean, youâre the Time player I assume. But Iâd think that the 13th would be safer, so we donât accidentally get seen by the Pawns. Since Iâm assuming that you two getting spotted here would be bad for the Timeline.â[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]"I'm.... pretty sure they would have no idea who I was so wouldn't be a too big a deal but with FI... yeah we would want to make sure the Pawns don't see us... Also, who are the pawns again?" [/color]Jovin asks sheepishly, very much showing off his himboiness. 
[color=#c6bc9f]"Are they the uh, folks who came after one but before two...?"[/color]

[color=#00ff00]âThe Pawns are my group. And yeah, thatâs what we are I think.â[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]"Also Rise, we should get ya a Hat, cause the horns are cute but could cause problems."[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest5b.png[/img]

Fortunately, you have your dawn poke-beanie in your sylladex. You are also blushing, on account of the rare compliment.

[color=#ff0000]"...okay, that should hopefully work."[/color]

You take a deep breath.
[color=#ff0000]"So, we need to pick a stakeout point. I'm thinking possibly somewhere near the chain of derspit, but maybe somewhere as far as the edgelord cave on the meteor. Any ideas or preferences?"[/color]

[color=#00ff00]âHmm, I donât think people look at the Derspit chain that often. So we could camp out in one of its rungs?â[/color] RN says, smiling a little bit at Riseâs blush. 
[color=#00ff00]ââ¦huh, i guess they are kinda attractive if youâre not thinking ofâ¦ the menace.â[/color] RN whispers subconsciously, thinking aloud.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest5c.gif[/img]

You are absolutely flustered. 
Your face is beet red and your heart rate is much higher than usual.
Naturally, the entire Network can sense this.

Fortunately, they have mercy in the face of your anxieties. 
Present Hazel even offers you a metaphysical hug, which you try to reciprocate, only to wind up hugging empty air in front of her past self still watching you.

[color=#ff0000]"...if anyone asks, you didn't see that."[/color]

Jovin blinks at you pulling the hood up, before chuckling at the beanie. 
[color=#c6bc9f]"That works and looks good on ya. Yeah, don't really think of[/color] [color=#5a00ff]that Fucker[/color][color=#c6bc9f] anymore..."[/color] Jovin nods at that.

You listen to Jovin, slightly shaken by the extra rage in his voice at the mention of The One Who First Had The Horns.

[color=#c6bc9f]"...the chain sounds good, as long as I don't have to move around alot, or with one of you folks when we do move..."[/color]

[color=#ff0000]"...That location works for me. Ready to take off?"[/color]

[color=#00ff00]âIn the immortal words of Sonic The Hedgehog: Letâs do it to it!â[/color]

Rise adjusts the hood to be at a more practical position.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest6.png[/img]

And so they fly towards the chain of Derspit, a cold chill whipping past them. Despite this however, Rise continues onward with them with determination.
As it turns out, getting flustered earlier did a lot to keep them warm.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest7.png[/img]

Rise glances around a bit too. The rough snow fields appear to blanket the entire Land, resolving into roughly cut hills and mountains.
Looking up, the meteor is upside-down from their perspective, and it's a bit dizzying to look at. The Beacon's light streams from a distant place up there. A comforting point of light in the otherwise endless darkness of the void beyond.

Jovin veers off a bit but is able to get back on track to the chain, landing lightly on the chain and 'standing' on the side of it near Rise as he looked around. 
[color=#c6bc9f]"Nice view..."[/color] He tilts his head, listening.

RN leans against the right side of the chain, covering the ears on his helmet. 
[color=#00ff00]ââ¦gods do these voidspawn ever shut up..?â[/color]

Rise takes a moment to try and listen to the deafening silence of the abyss.
Fortunately, while Rise can hear something out there, it's largely muffled by the wind and snow. Natural noise to filter out the unnatural.
[color=#ff0000]"This is quite the place... I've only been here in dreams before, so seeing and hearing it all in person is a bit different from what I'm used to."[/color]

A momentary pause.
[color=#ff0000]"...are we ready to jump ahead a few days?"[/color]

[color=#00ff00]âIâm ready.â[/color]

[color=#c6bc9f]âit is beautifulâ¦ and readyâ[/color]

You hold hands with the two of them as you make the jump to the end of October 13th. It is notably harder to do this while technically in the furthest ring.

p.c: Party: Arrive at the right time
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest9.png[/img]

The party arrives safe and sound.

Rise is notably tired from the jump. It must take quite some skill and power to navigate through the furthest ring timeways.
They tap their obscured horns to get a feeling for the current date, which is oddly stable feeling for a location in the furthest ring.
The current date is October 13th, close to midnight. As close as one can get to the 14th without actually landing on it.

[color=#ff0000]"...I've gotten us close to the date. The rest of the lost pawns should be showing up in a while."[/color]

Jovin glances out at the distant dream dome.
[color=#c6bc9f]âGood, donât have to worry bout thatâ¦â [/color]
Rise's tired state from the tougher-than-usual jump is troubling to him however.

[img]https://file.garden/YJ4GVaMz-xKjrPWz/dreamquest/dreamquest7b.gif[/img]

Rise uncaptchas some refreshments to share.

[color=#ff0000]"If needed, I've also brought my pokemon team. At very least, my Gallade knows hypnosis, which should come in handy if and when any of us need to sleep on command. If we need the big guns though, I did also bring Dialga."[/color]

Fortunately he was entirely out of scope with how much more advanced and powerful everyone else was and he's pretty much retired on a planet that's enchanted to not have any major conflicts." [/color]

[color=#ff0000]"Dialga is the time deity from Sinnoh. I managed to succeed in proving myself as an equal to them and now they're on my team to help kick voidco's ass, since those fucks sent a branch of their operations to the pokemon dimension too." [/color]
Rise grumbles at that.

Jovin blinks at that.

[color=#ff0000]

[color=#c6bc9f]"Trying to keep a lid on that voice... But yeah, Pokemon are real and nice. Currently been training a bunch of them... in fact need to find recruits for the uh, thing... But yeah don't think I have anything that can punch out a time god other then myself maybe..." [/color]
Jovin tries to be vague to avoid causal spoilers. He winds up succeeding at being vague.

RN just boggles at Rise, having his mind blown.
